title: Adorable!
text: My youngest is really into dinosaurs right now and so he was absolutely thrilled when I pulled these out of the amazon box. I was really impressed too. They're really nice quality. The plastic is thick and durable; and I didn't worry about any parts breaking during the assembly processes. Even though these were for my 3yo, my older kids "fought" over who would get to help him put these together. I wouldn't say the dinos are difficult to put together, but my 3yo did need assistance. An "extra hand", so to speak. Just to guide him along, hold pieces in place, etc. He'd still gleeful tell you he put them together all by himself, lol

title: Charizard is huge!
text: These bubble pops were a huge hit. Probably like your kids, mine are obsessed with pokmon. So this set was an excellent find. The rubber is nice and they feel like they are made well. Ours make the pop noise when played with.  Oh and the dragon is huge by the way. So much bigger in person than I expected. I don't think you'll just be disappointed with this set. They're nice.

title: Tons of fun!
text: These were an awesome find! I happy that they're an excellent choice, being both environmentally and pet friendly. I am so happy we will no longer have shreds of plastic water balloons all over our back yard. I like that these are dark, so they hid some of the dirt. The only thing I don't love about reusable water ball balloons is you really have to make sure they are all rung out at the end of each play session and lay them out to dry. If not, they get stinky quick. But I still think they are worth it.

title: Actually fun!
text:
I have kids and would nostalgically watch them play with modern day Colorforms. It was even fun to sit and do theirs with them; so of course I was excited to stumble upon an adult version! This is my second sticker & Chill book and they're really cool.
But I will admit I was skeptical at first. Even if adult color forms were fun, would they be able to keep my attention? Luckily I found that they do. I have had a great time so far. I've have a couple more of their older books to my wishlist because I found them useful for when I am without internet. They are great for traveling on long trips or when we go on our annual cabin vaca up north.
The only thing I don't love about this book is separating the vinyl "stickers" from the sheet they're made from. I found that if you go slow and hold down a few of the pieces at a time with your other fingertips, it's not as frustrating to separate these. It's a tedious process but luckily you only have to separate them once, lol. But overall, the book is mad from high quality materials. I'm really impressed by Sticker & Chill books.

title: Kids love it!
text: My older kids were thrilled when I pulled this out of the amazon box! They had one at summer school last year and so they were familiar with this toy already. We've had it for a couple of weeks now and ours is still working great. They come back to play with it often, so I am happy to report it is a toy that is not collecting dust yet.  And I can confirm it glows in the dark works quite well (the balloons are not gitd); even though my kids have seemed to forget about that feature. Oh and the other thing that surprised me is both the cars and the the little alien figures seem to get played with equally as often. This is a fun toy and my kids defiantly still approve.

title: Meh
text:
I'm kind of in the middle on this one. My kids love the anticipation and find it hilarious to feed the squirrel until he poops... but that is all that is happening here. It feels more like an activity for my kids rather than a game. No one really wins. Oh and I don't love how the acorns scatter across my kitchen table and then fall to the ground (I now have the kids set him on a dollar store plastic tray, to keep the acorns contained).
I'm not saying it's not fun or cute, because it is. The kids really like Charlie. He's fun. The set up was easy; I had the squirrel put together in just a minute or two. The quality is nice and the plastic is durable enough. But it at the end of the day, it's a pooping squirrel.

title: These are huge!!!
text: My boys were absolutely thrilled when I pulled these out of that Amazon bag. They are so much bigger in person! They're bright and colorful too. And the rubber feels high quality. The bubbles are flexible and are fun to pop. I think they should last quite a while. Our kids are happy and they're pretty cool pop toys, so I would have to recommend them. These were an awesome find!!!

title: Beyond cute!!!
text: This is a HUGE colorful set! I don't think we got a singe duplicate. I thought I would use these as stocking stuffers for all the kids, but they're mostly for my 8yo. She is going to be beyond thrilled. These are excellent quality and I couldn't be more impressed. What an excellent find!!!

title: Super cute
text: This is a really cute set. My youngest two kids have had these tracks for over a month now and they're holding up well. It's not a toy that is collecting dust here either; they pulled out a couple times a week to play with. The pieces seem well made and and nice quality. The plastic is nice and thick too. Some of the pieces have fallen off the table often and we have nothing break yet. Overall, we're all really happy with it.

title: So neat!
text:
This is a really unique fidget. It's big, bright, and colorful; so all of my kids are excited by it. And I like that it helps teach the keyboard letters & numbers to my children.
The rubber feels nice and durable. I think it should last for quite a while. I think it's the coolest bubble pop toy we've have had yet! My kids do too because they fight over it all the time, lol. I would certainly buy this again to give as a gift!!!

Hope this review is helpful.

title: This is soooooo cool!
text:
Holy cow, now this is a really unique fidget! It's even bigger in person than I expected, so I can promise we were all blown away. All four of my kids love it.
The rubber feels thick, flexible and and durable. Plus it is just as bright and colorful as it looks in the picture. I think this has got to be probably one of the coolest pop toys my kids have yet. My kids do too because this one the new must have one and they fight over it all the time, lol. It really is that neat. I would certainly buy it again to give as a gift... it would leave an impression, for sure!!!

title: So neat!!!
text: I picked this up as a gift for my daughter's birthday because there is nothing cooler than an animal loving Barbie! And this version did not disappoint. My daughter is a a huge Barbie fan -and- a huge animal fan, this particular zoologist Barbie was extra fun for our girl. Barbie's accessories are well made, too cute, and leave open lots of room for imaginative play. And those Koalas!!! There are no words for them. My daughter couldn't have been happier with this particular one. The doll came quickly and was packaged safely inside the Amazon box. It was a great choice.

title: So cool!!!
text: We live in Northern Wisconsin and it is winter here nearly half of the year! Some years we still have snow up to our knees, even through April... so our kids play in the snow a lot!!! So things like this penguin mold will be a really fun addition to our snow toys. And my kids were thrilled when I pulled this out of the Amazon box. It feels well made. The plastic is thick and it should last for many years. I'd highly recommend it. It would make a great gift too!!!

title: So neat!

I can't think of one bad thing to say about it. I bet the Almanac calendar becomes our traditional calendar going forward... it really is that impressively fun!

title: Super cute!

They've been using them for a couple weeks now and absolutely love them. The designs are really cute and you get a ton. This set should last forever, lol. title: Absolutely adorable!
text: This is simply too cute. We already loved the original Animal upon Animal, so I had high hopes for this version. This Xmas version went above and beyond! The pieces are all beautifully made and excellent quality. The tin is small and compact, so it's great for storage or travel. And the game itself is a blast! All four of my kids love it. They're always nice to each other and I encourage each other when they play this one. It's sweet, so I think they are remindd to be too, lol.

title: Love these!
text: This was a really cute set. I ordered them for my 3.5yo, but my 5yo also has had fun putting them together with her. The puzzles are well made too. They were a bit smaller than the Melissa & Doug wooden ones that come on a tray; but that didn't seem to matter to my little ones.  They're came stacked together and wrapped in shrink wrap. This set was an excellent find.

title: My daughter still loves them!
text:
These are cute and you get a lot of dolls in this set. We've had them for about a month now and my youngest still plays with them often. She loves to play with them in her play sets (houses and castles). They're holding up well. But the thrill of changing the clothes has long worn off. It was tough for her to do by herself and she always needs help.
Also, the packaging. I like the eco-packaging in theory, but I would have been disappointed to receive this as a gift. They come in a massive cardboard box and it's hard to tell exactly what you're getting. But the contents inside are little and in disarray. Opening this feels like a rip off.

title: A great set!
text:
This was an excellent find! My 8 daughter & 11yo son were beyond thrilled the moment I pulled this from the Amazon box. They begged to build it right away; and so they did! They worked very nicely together and had an absolute blast. They didn't even ask for help once (or fight, lol). And this set kept them busy for the better part of an afternoon.
This set is a good choice for either boys or girls. Had they done this by themselves, I suspect my 8yo would have needed a little bit of assistance and/or a few breaks to complete this set by herself. It's a tough call because I suspect a more experienced 8yo builder would not. My 11yo could have put this set together independently.
Also, it's simply fun and one of those Lego sets that looks even neater in person. And bigger put together, than it does pictured! We're really happy to have found this . It was a really fun build and a great addition to our evolving Lego collection.

title: Fantastic!
text:
I absolutely loved this set! The colors were bright and the materials nice quality. It was easy to put together and looked great once done. There were more than enough supplies included to make a beautiful large balloon arch. I received so many compliments!
The only thing to keep in mind is that this balloon project takes quite a bit of time to complete. It took me about 3 hours to set up the entire thing from start to finish. The good news is there are lots of youtube tips on how to make this go smoothly. And I also highly recommend having a balloon pump (manual or electronic)!!! Balloon arches can be a lot of work, but this kit was so worth it. No regrets!!!

title: So cool!!!
text: This was an excellent find! My 8 & 11yo were thrilled the moment I pulled it out of the Amazon box and begged to build this set right away. They had an absolute blast putting it together. They didn't even ask for help once (or fight, lol).  I think this is one of those Lego sets that looks even neater in person and put together, than it does pictured. We're really happy to have found this one. It was a really fun build and a great addition to our evolving Lego collection.

title: Excellent!!!
text: This set is just too cool! My 8yo was thrilled the moment I pulled it out of the Amazon box. She had an absolute blast putting it together. She didn't even need help whats-o-ever! It's one of those sets that looks neater put together out of the box than pictured. I'm happy to have found this one. It was a really fun build.

title: My kids are loving these!
text:
I think this would make for a great gift for a variety of kids. All four of my kids are having a blast with this (pre-k to pree-teen aged). It's something they can do together. And all of them find it exciting enough to put there tablets down for!
Overall, I think the set is a good value. They paddles themselves not made of the best quality plastic we've had. I know with four kids one of these paddles will probably be broken with in the year. But they're mostly rough housing in the basement with them, so it's expected. Either way, we've only had them a week and I feel my kids have already got their $15 dollars worth of entertainment, lol. I'd buy this Koosh set for them again, for sure.
Hope this review was helpful.

title: This is a good one!
text:
This was an excellent find. Activity tables, in general, have always been a huge hit with all of our babies, but this one is more unique in the sense that it encourages a lot of pounding. Let's be honest, babies have no fine motor skills; so slamming their little puggy fists down on anything is about all they have. And that's ok, because they love it (while strengthening their gross motor skills)! So what I found extra neat about this table has lots of areas that entourages that and will keep their attention. The xylophone part, especially!!!
The table itself feels heavy duty and well made. The plastic is very thick and durable; and it will be easy to wipe down and keep clean. The legs are easy to attach too. The only thing I didn't like about this toy had to do with my love/hate relationship with frustration free packaging. I love and prefer it because it's better for the environment... but it isn't very visually gift friendly. Of course I would prefer the recipient to see immediately the awesomeness they just unwrapped, but it's not a deal breaker. Overall though, I think this is the nicest table I've come across yet.

title: Very cute
text: This music fabric cube is unique. The plush cubes we've had from other brands were more textual and textile. Meaning they made crunchy sounds, a spring flower or had a mirror to look in. While there isn't much to interact with on the outside of the cube, the musical aspect is different and holds my newborn's attention even longer than the other cubes. This one feels well made too. It was an excellent, fun find!

title: Excellent fidgets!!!
text: These are really nice stretchy ropes. My oldest has severe ADHD and always has a fidget in his hands. They've given him these at school to keep his hands busy; and I am so incredibly happy to have them now at home too. Since they moment I pulled them out of the Amazon box, he hasn't put one down. Unless he's eating or playing a video game, he has one of these with him at all times. Its been a couple of weeks and they're holding up great. Wish I would have picked them up for him years ago.

title: Cute but....
text:
The nostalgic fun of Koosh balls pulls at my heartstrings, so I was thrilled to see they we're taking Koosh to the next level for my kids! And overall, this is a fun game. I like how it gets the kids up out of their seats; and how it truly is a game for "all ages" My preschoolers can play it with my preteens.
What I don't love about it is the balls flings are silly. This could have done without the fling stick. And it only comes with two balls, so my kids often end up using extra balls (or other randomness from around the toy room) to throw at it, instead of retrieving the two koosh balls every single time. And, omg is this thing loud for an indoor toy! When my kids turn it on, I can hear it anywhere in the house. Overall, it is fun and they like it a lot. They've gone back to play with it several times, and that is what is most important.

title: Super cool!
text:
This pop fidget was such a neat find! My kids were thrilled when I pulled it out of the Amazon box! They're huge pop bubble fans as it is; so this unique one quickly became their new favorite!
The pops feel well made too. The rubber is nice and durable; like it should last for quite a while. My kids have had it for a couple of weeks and it has held up excellent. It shows no signs of wear yet. We all recommend this one. It's super cool!!!

Hope this review was helpful.

title: It's huge!!!
text:
This is so much bigger in person than it looks in the photos! So with that said my kids were absolutely thrilled by this. I picked it up for my 3 & 5-year-old truck loving kids; but the 8 and 10-year-old play with it sometimes too, lol. It's pretty cool and I've never seen anything like it. It's pretty well made and doesn't tip over too easily. And I think it was an exceptionally good deal at $40 retail but $34 on sale is great. Definitely consider this one! It's a lot of bang for not too many bucks. And I am certain my kids would have been thrilled to receive this as a gift.
Hope this review was helpful.

title: Brings back memories!
text:
This kit is just too cute. I picked it up for my 8-year-old and she took to it instantly. But I admit, I was just as excited as she was when I pulled it out of the Amazon box, lol.
Everything you need is included. I had to help her get started but after that she was off on her own. She finished about a quarter of it over the course of watching a movie the first night; and is about 2/3 of the way through it now. So it is keeping her busy and holding her attention well. This latch rug set was an excellent find. I think she would have loved to receive this as a gift!
Hope this review was helpful.

title: Nostalgic fun!!!
text: I think I was more excited to pull this out of the Amazon box than my 8yo daughter was, lol. The good news was she had just as much fun weaving her first pot holder, as I remember it being. It's a nice set. The loops were the perfect amount of stretchy; and for the most part she was able to do the majority of it herself. This brought back a lot of memories and I'm happy we have it.

title: It's cute.
text:
There's a lot of things I like about this board and a couple of things that I left to be desired. My three and a half year old was thrilled to receive this and took too it immediately. He is a little artist, so he reused it several times. It's really nice how it has storage in the bottom to keep all the pieces together (that's really helpful). And he likes that he can use any of his Crayola markers on it too.
But I wouldn't exactly consider it good for travel. The markers don't dry immediately and his hands and sleeves are always covered in (washable) ink. It's not how I want to show up to an event of any kind, lol. And the thrill of the shapes wore of pretty quickly for him too.

title: Not all worked
text:
Unfortunately I cannot give this set a great review because quite a few of the pieces we tested did not work. Of the bracelets, six of the eight did not light up. We didn't try all of the rings, but out of the dozen or so random ones I grabbed to test, four didn't work. Two had dead batteries and the other two barey flashed. The on/off switch can be pretty hard to move on some of them too. Not as big of a deal, but I also found some of the items had missing paint on the details. We picked up a similar set last Halloween (it was all rings) and those worked out well.... So I think you can do better than this set. The one nice thing I do have to say is it seems the batteries are lasting. I left a couple of the rings running and they've been going for 20 hours now.
Hope this review was helpful.

title: Heavy and pointy! Very unique
text:
I have a lot of dice in my collection and these ones stand out!
These are heavy metal and pointy on the edges. They are VERY solid dice, make a nice clunk when you roll them. They appear to roll well and true. I wouldn't roll them on a surface that you like though, the points will likely scratch. Make sure to use a dice box or something similar.
I got the "Red Copper" style, and it looks great, like antiqued brass/copper.
The number font is very easy to read, and is etched in there very precisely.
*** I hope you find this review real, helpful, and really helpful! ***

title: Big boy for real gamers!
text:
I've been wanting to add a d100 to my arsenal for quite some time, and this one doesn't disappoint!
Its big (50mm), has nice weight to it, and is very easy to read the numbers.
Like all d100s, it will roll for awhile before it settles down, but it rolls nicely and I haven't noticed any bad spots. If you want a true 1-100 roll, replace your d10s and get this monster!
*** I hope you find this review real, helpful, and really helpful! ***

title: Unique color on some quality dice
text:
These are some sharp-looking (see what I did there?) dice! The colors combination was unique for me, I don't have any other dice in my collection with this color combo. It says "Brown with Silver Numbers", but they are really more of a deep red/brown/purple color, it really cool.
The edges and points are sharp as advertised (do NOT step on these) and they roll well and true.
They feel a little lighter than some of my other dice of the same size, but not TOO light where it feels like they aren't rolling correctly. They are also slightly larger than my standard set.
I am glad to add these dice to my ever growing collection.
*** I hope you find this review real, helpful, and really helpful! ***

title: Very nice looking dice
text:
These are some sharp-looking (see what I did there?) dice! The colors are bright and vibrant, like the pictures
The edges and points are sharp as advertised (do NOT step on these) and they roll well and true.
They feel a little lighter than some of my other dice of the same size, but not TOO light where it feels like they aren't rolling correctly. They are also slightly larger than my standard set.
I am glad to add these dice to my ever growing collection.
*** I hope you find this review real, helpful, and really helpful! ***

title: Super fun dice!
text:
These are beautiful dice! True head-turners for your next game day!
The dragon design wraps around the numbers, which are very clear to read.
The weight is nice and hefty even though they are hollow. They are slightly larger than my standard dice also. They roll nice and appear to roll true.
*** I hope you find this review real, helpful, and really helpful! ***

title: Buy these!!!
text:
We have five kids in our family, so we've been surrounded by Melissa and Doug products for over a decade. Water WOW books have been one of their best lines of toys to date, in my opinion. Every single one of my kids spent their toddler years playing with these books, over and over again. And this current three pack is every bit as neat as they always have been.
The books are made of high very quality, thick cardboard and are truly reusable. These will keep your bored toddlers busy in the car and in the grocery.... and are especially excellent to have in a quite settings like church. I honestly can not think of one bad thing to say about M&D Water Wow books. They make the perfect, inexpensive gift too. I've given out a dozen or more WOW books myself over the years. Just scroll back up and click "add to cart". You won't regret it. Promise.

title: Flawed Claw
text:
We have five kids in our family, so we've been swimming in Imaginext for nearly a decade. They truly are one of the most high quality and most durable lines out there; and always at the top of my kids most played toys. I have nothing but good things to say about Imaginext. But that doesn't mean every piece they've ever put out has been a hit.
And unfortunately, I feel this playset leaves a lot to be desired. It's simply boring. There isn't as much "surprise" interaction like with other sets. But the biggest disappointment for us was the crane claw. Now, I understand that it's a replica of a game.... and the claw in real life rarely works, lol. Some of the fun is in loosing. But as a child's toy, the claw needs to work a lot better. Since it doesn't, my kids kinda just ignore this playset, I think.
I think Imaginext has released a very similar version of this in the past. I'm hoping it is just an oops with this 2021 release claw error. Because if the claw worked a lot better, I'm certain kids of all ages would absolutely love it.

title: Excellent Playset!
text:
This was an awesome find! It is one of the bigger playsets I've seen from little people in recent years, but you can't tell by the photos! At $40 it's a much better value than it looks, I promise.
This piece is exceptionally well made too. Our three-year-old absolutely loves Elsa's "house". This set has been, by far, one of the most played with toys lately too. Truly. All of our kids have played with it daily for the last two weeks. Plus the accessories that were included were just too cute too. We're a huge Disney household, so words cannot express how happy we ALL are with this set! Hope this review was helpful!

title: Lots of fun!
text: From the moment I pulled these out of the Amazon bag, my kids were super excited by these Among Us party favors! I picked them up as Halloween bag party favors, but gave a couple to each of my kids early to test them out. I think they're cute, colorful and nice quality for what they are. They're kids also think they're neat; and I would have been happy to hand out these non-sugary treats any time of year!!! We'd definitely have to recommend them!

title: Really nice set
text:
I picked these up as for my older kid's classrooms this year, but let each of my kids have a couple to test out for themselves. They stuffed them full of fidgety toys from around the house; and the younger kids were more than proud to carry their bags around all weekend long. The test monkeys did great and bags held up well! So yeah, I think they're cute and nice quality for what they are. The colors are bright and they can hold a lot of stuff.
We'd definitely have to recommend them!

title: Good, inexpensive assortment
text:
From the moment I pulled these out of the Amazon bag, my kids were super excited by this huge assortment of goodies. I picked this set up as Halloween bag party favors, but let each of my kids play with some of the pieces early to test them out. They played and fidgeted with them all weekend long! So the kids think it's a cool set. From an adult's perspective, I can see why they think this stuff is fun. But I also think these are inexpensively made (pretty cheap) plastic trinkets. so don't expect too much.
If you're in the market for some non-sugary Halloween treats, I would recommend these if you find the price to be right.

title: Lots of fun!
text:
From the moment I pulled these out of the Amazon bag, my kids were super excited by these flingy slingshots. I picked them up as Halloween bag party favors, but let each of my kids have a couple early to test them out. They played and fidgeted with them all weekend long! I think they're cute and nice quality for what they are.
I picked these up because our children's elementary school is not allowing birthday and holiday food treats this year because of covid. That includes Halloween candy. So these fling things are an awesome, affordable replacement! I love that they double as a fidget toy too. They're neat and I would have LOVED to hand out these non-sugary treats any time of year!!! We'd definitely have to recommend them!

title: Too cute!!!
text:
My kids were super excited by this set of wind up chompers! They tested each and everyone individually, I promise. They're easy to wind up and they all worked great!
I picked these up because our kid's elementary school has had to banned real food treats this year due to covid. Including Halloween candy, as of now anyway. These are a cute, affordable alternative. So if you're not wanting to give out something laced with sugar, these are perfect!!!

title: Absolutely fantastic
text:
My kids were thrilled when I pulled this camera out of the box; and I swear, they have not put it down since. It is by far their most favorite new toy and they are getting their money's worth. The only complaint I can think of is that we only have one! Because my kids really do fight over it all the time.
The camera itself is incredibly durable. It's made out of a thick, slightly rubbery plastic. The buttons and features are incredibly easy to learn and use too. It's almost embarrassing how much better my kids are at using this camera than I am, lol. It takes great photos and it doesn't burn through batteries. I would have to strongly suggest you consider this one, considering how much mileage it has gotten here.

title: Really neat
text: This was an awesome find and love this fun piece of nostalgia! Now my kids are hooked and loving this oil drip timer every much I loved mine back in the 80's. We've had it for a month now and I catch the kids flipping it over all the time. It seems durable too... ours has fallen off the counter several times and hasn't broken yet. I'd definitely recommend it. It's captivating.

title: Very cool!
text: We're a huge Marvel fam, so I expected our kids would love these guys right from the get go. And they sure did. From the moment I pulled these out of the Amazon box, they've barely been put down. All three of my kids continue to play with them day after day. They make excellent "fidget" toys too. Everyone here would recommend these. They would make a great gift. I will be picking up more Bend and Flex figures for Xmas, for sure.

title: Very cute!
text: My kids adore this water squishy. I gave it to them a few days ago and one of them has had it in their hands 24/7. It makes for an excellent fidget toy. And it's hold up well to three kids fighting over it, lol. I'm going to have to go buy more now...

title: Fun but pricy
text:
While these are neat, they are not the full sized tubes my kids are used to pick up at the arcades. These are far smaller; barely the thickness of my ring finger. I rarely comment on the price of a product in my reviews, since the price often fluctuates. But at the time of this review, these ere listed for $10 for a box of 12 . I would have been disappointed to receive theses having paid that much. These should be closer to $6 in my opinion.
The quality seems pretty good. The tubes are as durable as any others like them, and the colors are bright. None of ours arrived broken. These would make the perfect party bag or stocking stuffers. If you find the price to be right, I'd still recommend them.

title: So very cool!!!
text:
This kit is just too adorable!!! I absolutely love it and our kids were so surprised!
We found all of the pieces to be of excellent quality. Truly. This was the seventh balloon strand I've put together since covid hit, so I can say this one was very easy to use. I really appreciate that everything you need comes included in this set.
But keep in mind is that this type of party decor is not a quick and easy process. Balloon arches are a VERY time consuming. It took my husband and I several hours to put this Halloween kit together, from start to finish. And that was with is using a balloon pump (an absolute must have, btw). But it was worth every minute we spent creating it. It makes me smile every time I look at it and I can't recommend it enough. It really adds a ton of fun to the holiday.

If this is your first balloon arch, I would recommend watching a couple of YouTube videos for some helpful hits on making the arch. And definitely watch a video on how to use that knotting tool, too. Your hands will thank you! Balloon arches are a little intimidating at first, but they're very rewarding and look so incredibly cool.

Hope this review was helpful.

title: Not exactly a "kit"
text:
As this kit comes, you would not be able to construct the balloon arch frame as pictured. It's missing the part to to make the "arch"!!!
I've made 6 birthday balloon arches since covid hit, but this is the first holiday themed one I will be putting together. Overall, I found the pieces that came in this set to be of excellent quality. But when I say this isn't a true kit, I mean it doesn't come with the plastic clear balloon strip, knotting tool or balloon dots like every other kit I've ordered has. At the very least, you need the clear strip to make the arch. And the knotting tool is also a must have in my opinion. It hurts knotting off 200 plus balloons, lol. I have plenty of balloon strips and knotting tools around here, but I doubt most people would have keep this stuff on hand. So if you're in the market for a arch REFILL kit, order this one. It is cute after all. But if you're starting from scratch, I'd say skip this one.
I hope this review was helpful.

title: A little more than nostalgic then cool
text:
This version of Optimus was a pretty cool find. Overall, it is impressively big and attention grabbing loud. And I feel the materials used are heavy enough to last through several childhoods. We've had this particular transformer for over a month now and I catch them playing with it several times a week. So I am very happy to report that this has not been another big toy taking up valuable space.
But I think this is a toy that would be better for older children. My younger ones have trouble transforming him by themselves; which is frustrating to both them, their older siblings and to us (because they then have to interrupt what we're doing to ask us for help). It feels like too much work and too long of a process to get him folded down; just to undo it in a tenth of a second with that ridiculously cool pop-up feature. But that's my only complaint really. The kids obviously haven't noticed, lol.
So I would definitely have to recommend it, but older kids over 5yo. It really is huge and fun. And I can promise that any one of my kids would have been thrilled to receive this as a gift. They really would have.

title: This is too cute!
text:
This baby alive doll was an excellent find. From the moment I pulled her out of the Amazon box, she has been my youngest new favorite thing. It's been a couple of weeks now and my daughter still carries her around the house all day long. I was worried some of the features would get "old" and then soon we just have another doll to add to the toy pile. Lucky, that hasn't happened the thrill hasn't worn off. This achoo doll is very captivating.
This doll's features are just to cute too. When her cute little button nose turns pink, even I can barely stand it... my instincts tell me to go fix it, lol. Needless to say, my daughter absolutely loves taking care of her sick baby. It's the diagnosing and healing her baby's ailments with medicine that is very rewarding. Plus, all the accessories that come with a doll are cute too.
But what I like the best about the doll is she is inspiring additional pretend play. My daughter has pulled out her doctor kit far more often and is inventing other problems to fix, lol. Over all it's a really cute doll and my daughter is getting her money's worth. I probably wouldn't recommend this for a very young toddler or as a child's first baby doll. The achoo version is little big and clunky in comparison, and doesn't feel like a traditional newborn baby doll. That's not to say that I don't recommend this one because I certainly do. It just feels like a step up from the first round of baby doll to me. But even then, I bet kids who aren't into swaddling and carrying around newborn baby dolls, would still love this because of the interactive features. And even cut my older preteen boys playing with it, so kids of any age do enjoy it!
Hope this review is helpful.

title: Very cool!!!
text:
This kit is just too adorable!!! I love that all the things I needed to make a beautiful Halloween themed balloon arch came included in this kit. And our kids were absolutely thrilled when they saw it!
We found all of the pieces to be of excellent quality. Truly. This was be the 7th balloon strand I've put together since Covid hit and I can say this one was very easy to use. This is the first time I've done a balloon arch to decorate for an event other than a kid's birthday. And gosh, am I happy that I did. It's truly awesome and it looks really cool in person.
But keep in mind is that this type of party decor is not a quick process! Balloon arches are time consuming! It took my husband and I several hours to put it together, from start to finish. And that was with is using a balloon pump (a must have, btw). Also, take a few minutes to watch some youtube videos on how to properly use the finger knotting tool and other balloon arch making tips. You will be so grateful you took the extra 10 minutes to learn from other's helpful hints.
But even if balloon arches are time consuming, it was still it's worth every minute we spent creating it. And I can't recommend this balloon arch enough. I bet you'll be just as thrilled with the results as we were. Absolutely no regrets here.

Hope this review was helpful and Happy Halloween!

title: Now this is cool!
text:
This ball is massive! Our kids are having a blast playing with it outside. We have a large, fenced-in backyard for the puppies; so the dogs have been chasing it around a bit here and there with the kids. This ball has taking a beating so far and is holding up beautifully. It is strong, durable and beautifully colored. I honestly can't think of one bad thing to say about it! It's really cool and I love that it gets my kids moving. My kids would have been told to receive this as a gift!
Hope this review was helpful.

title: This is massive!
text:
My kids were thrilled when I pulled this out of the Amazon box! This Paw Patrol playset is huge. It's made out of durable plastic and is sturdy once put together. And it's an absolute blast. I catch my younger kids playing with it on a daily basis.
Assembly took a little bit of time and was a little stressful with three kids hovering over me asking "are you done yet?" every five seconds, lol. So maybe if you were planning on giving this as a present, considered taking it out of the box and putting it together ahead of time. It also takes five batteries, so have those on hand too. I am happy to report all the parts and pieces were included with our tower. Overall, we're very impressed!
Hope this review is helpful.

title: Absolute fun!
text:
I had the Jumanji board game many years ago and it is every bit as fun as I remember. This truly is a game for the "whole family". Even my 6yo can play with us, since it is one of those types of games where all participants continuously keep him on track with helpful prompts and reminders. My older kids have a blast too. We've had it for about a month now and have played it three times already. It really is a fun game.
I like this actual set as well. It's a lot nicer than the cardboard $20 version of this game. It's simply a lot cooler. But, if you're thinking you'll be able to save $100 buying this one over the Replica version, I don't think you'll be happy. While this version feels along the lines of the replica, it is NOT as nice as that one. For example, the plastic used to make this one feels lighter or "cheaper" compared to the replica version. And the cute details are missing (like the "bone" dice and "carved" pieces) aren't included with the one I am reviewing today. But I suppose that is why they call this only "Deluxe" and not a "Replica".
Since I wasn't looking for a replica, I am very happy with this version. It looks very nice and would make an excellent gift. Any one of my kids would have been thrilled to receive this! Everyone in our family would recommend it!

title: Tons of fun!
text: My 6 and 8yo daughters have had an absolute blast with this kit! Our rollers worked and the kids found this easy to do by themselves. It is glitter related, so of course it's going to be a little messy. But it is by far not the messiest kit we've had. The colors are bright and the tattoos last. This set would make an excellent gift. It's creative and fun.... and there are plenty of supplies to keep the kids glitter tattooing over and over again. I'll definitely be back to buy this for their cousins for the holidays!

title: This actually works!!!
text:
My 8yo is obsessed with microscopes (and science) at the moment. Unfortunately, finding a children's microscope that lasts has been the real challenge for us. This has been our fourth (yes, the 4th!!!) kid's microscope this year. But I am happy to say this one is holding up well so far! Two months later!!! It feels well made and durable. And the microscope is very easy for her to use. Plus the features are better on this one than others we've had in the recent past.
This kit comes with a decent amount of slides to get started. They're made out of plastic and won't break. But if you find your kids are really into this, I would recommend coming back to Amazon for an additional pre-made slide kit. There are all sorts of generic add on slide kits on here (in sets of 50 or 100). They are really cool and the variety will keep them using this microscope for years. But there is more than enough in this kit to get started; and it comes with blank slides so they can create their own too. It's a lot of fun and I would definitely have to recommend this. It really would make an excellent gift!

title: This is too cute!
text:
Our 8 year old was absolutely thrilled when I pulled this out of the Amazon box. Even though our kids have opened many blind bags, this was our first time with the small Hatchimals. She found every last one of these to be just too cute. And while she loved the animals, but she was extra thrilled by the "unboxing" processes.
I think this set is a pretty good value too. They took a while to open and made a bit of a fun mess. It was worth the clean up, lol. But we like that the carton is reusable and overall both her dad and I were impressed with the quality of these cute little animals. They really are that cute. I'll most likely be back to buy her more for this coming Christmas.

title: Now these are fun!!!
text:
Kinetic Sand was always a huge hit for my older children when they were young, so I was really excited to give these to our 4yo. This three pack is too cute and he was thrilled. And of course, my 8 and 11yo were instantly jealous; asking to play along with him while he opened these, lol. They all had a blast and these kept them a lot busier for a lot longer than I expected. I think the dinosaurs would have been difficult for the younger ones to put together themselves, but I didn't hear any complaints because the older kids didn't have a problem.
And these digs were not just a lot of fun the first time around! Ours have gotten replay value. They've found other things around the house (like quarters and mini lego sized dudes) to rebury in the sand. They're loving re-surprising one another with new found treasure. And clean up for us is a breeze since I trimmed down an old Amazon box (leaving a one inch lip around all four sides) and have them play with treasure boxes in there. When they're done, I just shake the box out outside. These treasure chests are absolutely adorable and I think they're a good value. I'd buy them again as a gift for their friends or cousins, for sure.
Hope this review was helpful.

title: Updated nostalgia!
text:
Using my own Spirograph is one of my most favorite childhood memories, so I was thrilled to give this set to my kids. And all of them absolutely love it as much as I did back then. I think my 8yo loves it even more, lol. This version is easy enough for my older kids to use on their own, and they're really good at helping their younger siblings when they need it here and there (like with replacing the paper).
This set has really has gotten a lot of mileage too. We've had it for over a month now and at least one of the kids pulls this out to draw with every other day. I haven't had to change the batteries yet, even though they relentlessly spin their drawings like crazy. And the pens are still nice and juicy after a month too. But my most favorite part about this version is how compact and portable it is. Clean up is a breeze since all the extra parts fit nicely in the section below. It's really cool. I would come back to buy this as a gift for their friends or cousins, for sure!
Hope this review was helpful.

title: It's huge!!!
text:
I'm almost certain this is going to be my children's most favorite toy of 2021. From the moment I pulled it out of the Amazon box, they were thrilled. And I'm pretty sure they played with it everyday since. The oldest is 12 and the youngest is six, so this toy covers a large age range, imo.
The remote control is very easy to use. And it works excellent outdoors, which is awesome. The truck is massive and very sturdy. The only thing I don't "love" about it is that my kids fight over whose turn it is, lol. But I suppose that's all right. It's worth every last penny. I would definitely buy this as a gift!
Hope this review was helpful.

title: Very excited kids!
text:
This was our first ever candy making kit, so I cannot tell you how excited my kids were when they pulled this out of the Amazon box! There are plenty of options included and the instruction manual is easy to follow. I do hover over my children, but for the most part my 8 and 11yo can do everything themselves.
Sometimes it can be irritating when everything that you need to do the experiments isn't included. But this kit gets a pass since it's all food related. For example, I wouldn't want my kids using year old chocolate chips, so I am happy to provide those myself, lol. And since we do cook a lot at home as it is, I actually already have most of the "extra" ingredients on hand. I only had to add two or three things to our shopping list. It's a lot of fun and my kids would certainly recommend it.

title: Another fun Poke build by Mega!
text:
We have gotten several of the Pokemon builds by Mega (Tyranitar and Charmander) and they all look great and are fun to build. I love that they offer this line, my kids LOVE Pokemon and building blocks.
I don't feel that the pieces are as good a quality as Lego, but they are the best available for this franchise.
We will continue to get more models as they come out, I hope this line produces many more options!
*** I hope you find my review helpful and it helps you select the item that will fit your needs!

title: An absolute blast!!!
text: I cannot tell you how excited my kids were when I pulled this Gravitor out of the Amazon box! And they've had an absolute blast playing with it every single day since then. And holy cow, can this toy take a beating. It is incredibly durable and holding up far better than I expected. And the charge life is pretty long too. I have nothing but good things to say about this. This toy has been a huge hit! I can't recommend it enough.

title: Fun intro to transforming toys
text:
This is a fairly simple, easy to use transforming toy from VTech. They make many high quality, lower priced "action" kids toys. This car/dino transformer is very nice for young kids. It says 4+, but I think it would be ideal for 3-5.
It transforms between car and dino very easily, and has a few sound and light features which are fun for young ones. Definitely basic functions, but it does them very well.
I think an older kid may tire of this toy and prefer something more advanced, but great for smaller kids that appreciate the bells and whistles more.
Great starter toy into this genre!
I hope this review was helpful!

title: This is pretty cool!
text: This is a pretty unique fidget. My kids especially enjoyed the little balls that came with it. And I like that it helps reinforce letters for my younger children. The rubber feels nice and durable; It should last for quite a while. It's a good size too. Definitely no regrets here.

title: MINI SIZED!
text:
These are not the same size as we are used to. As you can tell by my photos we have standard size ones (orange). The photos show a comparison of these two side-by-side (yellow & blue are from this set).
With that said, I'm not disappointed. At first, I wasn't sure how this was going to go over with my kids. We naturally tend to think bigger is better, but I was wrong. My kids spend entire days fidgeting with these. No one said anything about them being a smaller size. In fact, I would say my kids played with these more than the bigger ones. And they especially like that they these loop together.
Besides, I think the set of tubes is a good value. You get an entire box of smaller ones for not much more that what I've paid for 6 of the larger sized tubes. And these smaller tubes don't seem to crush anywhere near as easily. This type of tube
(regardless of size or brand) have to be made out of a thinner plastic to stay flexible.... But that also means they get destroyed so easily. Which is frustrating for how much they cost. The simple fact that these last longer, definitely make some worth a couple extra dollars in my opinion.

title: Surprisingly speedy!
text:
Fun little RC car! This is a 3 wheeled vehicle, 2 in the front, and 1 in the back. It is very responsive and I am very pleasantly surprised by the speed! This thing is zippy on pavement.
I have not had a chance to try it on water yet, but the wheels have soft angled blades for pushing it through the water, looks like it would work well.
The controller is a little cheap looking, and the controls feel loose, but it works well.
The most fun part for my kids is the other button on the remote. It controls the sharks chomping teeth action! They love it (our cat does not though)!
This is a very fun little RC car, far more than I expected. Would recommend!
I hope you found this review helpful

title: My kids won't put him down
text:
My older kids love the Heroes of Goo line. An awful lot actually. They are one of the few toys they'll actually play with at this age. So I cannot even tell you how excited they were when I pulled this guy out of the Amazon. Chaotic happinesses, truly.
Heroes of Goo are like fidget toys and superheroes dolls mashed into one. They're all cool but this one just got better! The new power pump feature is a ton of fun. And now that they are posable, it takes these characters to a whole new level. The only thing I regret about ordering this is my preteens are acting like 5 year olds again. I'm breaking up fights and setting "you've had him for an hour" timers. Everybody wants him, lol. So yeah, they would say he is definitely worth it!!!

Hope this review was helpful!

title: Fun take on a classic game! Overload is a neat option
text:
Uno has many different varieties, and my kids are fond of most of them.
This was new to us, and they really liked this one!
Its basically Uno, but you can play to any one of the 3 piles. The lights indicate how many cards have been played to that pile by changing from Green to Yellow to Red. If you play too many, it goes into Overload, and the player draws penalty cards. There is also a "Stealth" mode were the piles can just to Overload at anytime, which keeps it exciting. If you like Uno, I would definitely give this one a try, its far more fun than some of the other versions they have out there.
I hope this was a helpful review!!

title: New-age Rock'em Sock'em robots!
text:
My kids are having a blast with this line! They are small figures, Imaginext size, and they do battle until they split apart!
These remind me very much of RockEm SockEm Robots from days past. You line up your battler on the battle board, and then duke it out with another player. When they break, its over.
Each of the figures has a unique look, and their own weapon style. I could see this being very collectible, as my kids like to cycle through the different guys so they can use the one with the axe, or the one with the mace... the variety keeps them trying new combinations constantly.
I will look forward to future battle packs with more characters!
I hope this review was helpful!

title: Too sweet
text:
I pick these up for my niece's birthday and they were perfect. A super huge hit! The dolls themselves and their accessories feel well made. They should a last for a long time. The dolls arrived quickly and packaged safely in an Amazon box. This is a really nice set. Definitely would buy them again!
Hope this review was helpful

title: She's so cool!!!
text: I picked this up as a gift for my daughter's birthday because there is nothing cooler than a rockin' Barbie holding a guitar, lol. But truly this doll did not disappoint. She is a huge Barbie fan and this particular Barbie was a lot of fun. Her accessories are well made, too cute, and leave open lots of room for imaginative play. She couldn't have been happier with this particular one. The doll came quickly and was packaged safely inside the Amazon box.

title: Misleading
text: This is a bag, plain and simple. The dividers are not sewn into the bottom of the bag, so there's no separation of dice or "pockets" going on here. I would have returned this and cannot recommend it.

title: Now this is a cool set!!!
text:
We have always been a big superhero family with DC my personal favorite of course! So I can't tell you how excited everyone was when I pulled this set out of the Amazon box! The whole house lit up!!!
I was quite impressed by these. For a set of four, I expected them to smaller. But much to my surprise these are still pretty big. And I really like that you get four of them, so my three older kids can each have one and don't fight over them. Plus we've found they make an excellent fidget toys too. My oldest almost always has one of these Heros of Goo "dolls" in his hands fidgeting with it while watching YouTube. We absolutely love this line of toys. They've all been well made and none have broken so far. They're a great gift idea for older kids, truly. We all definitely recommend them!!!

title: Yay for Adult Colorforms!
text:
Now this book is actually fun. I have younger children and nostalgically watched them play with modern day Colorforms. It was even fun to sit and do theirs with them; so I was excited to get this book, just for myself!
But I will admit I was skeptical at first. Even if it was fun, wouldn't keep my attention? Luckily I found it does it does and have had a blast doing several of these pages so far. I've added a couple more of their books to my wishlist because I really want them for the couple times a year I am without internet. They'll be great for traveling on long trips or when we go on our annual cabin vaca up north.
The only thing I don't love about this book is sperating the vinyl "stickers" from the sheet they're made from. I found that if you go slow and hold down a few of the pieces at a time with your other fingertips, it's not as frustrating to separate these. Luckily you only have to separate them once, lol.

Hope this review helpful!

title: Super adorable project!
text: This set is just too cute. These are pretty easy for my 3.5 year old daughter to sit on the couch and do them independently. She is so proud of her creations too. I can't tell you how happy these have made her. Plus they keep her busy for a solid half hour or more, which is truly invaluable. They're worth every penny!

title: 6 pack of Pokemon fun
text:
My kids love Pokemon and bricks. We have gotten a few of the Mega sets and they have all been great.
This one has 6 small builds and 6 pokeballs!
The builds all really look like the Pokemon they are supposed to be, and the Ball containers are fun too!
Collect them all!

title: More colorful than most!
text:
My kids love poppers, and spinners, so this is a nice dual take on their favorites!
They are nice and bright colors, which is a nice change from the solid ones we had before.
Popper part works great, so does the spinner part.
Good clean fun!

title: So cool! Not cheap feeling
text:
I have had "metal" dice before and often the are very thin and cheap feeling. I've felt that if I push on them too hard, they may bend or distort. Not these dice!
They have a very sturdy composition, they make a nice noise when you roll them, and I have no worries about them crumpling or distorting.
They also look awesome! This is my set going forward for my paladin.
May the odds ever be in your favor..

title: So sweet!!!
text: My 3-year-old is really into dress up play right now and this was an excellent addition to her collection. She looks absolutely adorable in this outfit. While the dress is too cute by itself, I would say the gloves are her favorite part. She can't get enough of them. We really love this set... Absolutely no regrets!

title: Very cute!
text:
My 3 year old daughter is very much in the dress up play at the moment, So I thought this would be an excellent set for her. She was very excited when we pull this set out of the Amazon box!
Overall, I found the pieces to be pretty well made. The box came damaged, but the pieces inside held up and we're not. Plastic is rather study.
I took off a star because I felt the shoes are on a small side. My daughter has wide feet, so I don't think she'll be able to wear them next year. Wide feet aside, I suspect that these shoes would be too small for some 4 or 5-year-olds.
But overall it really is a cute set. She was incredibly happy to have it!!!

title: Super cute
text:
I picked this up for my daughter's third birthday and she couldn't have been more thrilled! Every meal now a baby doll or a stuffed plush has to sit right next to her and "eat" with us at the kitchen table. It's just too cute.
The high chair feels pretty well made. I mean I don't think it's going to last decades, but it should hold up just fine through a kid or two. I really like it. Absolutely no regrets!
Hope this review was helpful!

title: Too sweet!!!
text:
Oh my gosh, this is so adorable. Really, I couldn't be more impressed. You're probably reading this because your kid loves Doc as much as mine does. So I can't even tell you how excited my daughter was when I pulled this out of the Amazon box! The set was bigger than I was expecting, that's for sure.
Right from the beginning, she was obsessed with her new baby doll. All of the accessories that came with baby Doc couldn't be cuter either. Her brothers like to pretend play the doll too, which adds an extra layer of sweetness. That's when they're allowed to anyway. Our daughter carries this doll just every where it seems, lol. And I've seen her playing with the accessories at least once a day too. She really is having a good time and absolutely loves this baby.
Plus I found the doll and her accessories to be nice quality. Overall the doll feels well made. The plastic used in this set feels thick and heavy duty. We just love her. It was a very nice set. Absolutely no regrets!
Hope this review was helpful!!!

title: Much bigger than it looks in the photos!!!
text:
This is one of the bigger playsets I've seen from little people in recent years, but you can't tell by the photos! At $40 it's a much better value than it looks, I promise.
Just like all little people products, this piece is exceptionally well made. Our three-year-old absolutely loves this playhouse. This was by far her favorite birthday present this year. Truly. All of our kids have played with it daily for the last two weeks. Plus the accessories that were included were just too cute too. And my favorite part: the EV car charger... It's very modern and hilarious sweet. Words cannot express how happy we are with this set! Hope this review was helpful!

title: Fit well!!!
text:
I recently picked up one of the best selling baby dolls on Amazon for my daughter... and she loves changing the baby's clothes. (The doll is Berenguer Boutique by JC Toy Store).
Her new baby doll is a 15-in, so these clothes are perfect. They're really easy to get on and off. I do still have to help her occasionally with some pieces but for the most part my daughter is able to independently change her baby doll's clothes with this set. The clothes are well made and super cute too. We're very happy with them. Hope this review was helpful.

title: Tons of fun!!!
text: I pick this up for our backyard and I am so happy I did! This octopus is just too cute and she works great!!! Bubbles for days!!! And I like how easy she is to refill, so the kids can do that part themselves. They've been playing with it for almost 2 weeks now and I haven't had to replace the batteries yet. We're all loving this blower.

title: So much fun!!!
text: This bubble blower is working out awesome. I am so happy I've picked it up for the kids. They've been playing with it for a couple weeks now and I haven't had to change the batteries yet. This blower makes some pretty big bubbles too! It has been a high hit, so far.

title: Very nice!
text: These decorations are just too cute! We hung them up last weekend for my daughter's birthday party and they are an excellent addition. They really helped make the kitchen look festive and added to the overall theme. They were lightweight so they were super easy to hang from the ceiling. Definitely recommended!!!

title: Very cute!!!
text:
This costume is adorable. Words cannot express how excited my daughter was when we pulled this out of the Amazon box!!! This costume fits my daughter very well and she's absolutely in love. The accessories that came with it are a huge hit too (especially the gloves)!!!
My daughter also inherited some hand-me-down authentic Disney store costumes from her older cousins. Most of them are the $50 versions and a couple are the deluxe that used to retail for around $100. When comparing those Disney Store costumes to this little mermaid one, I'm sorry to say the exceptional quality is just not here. The material on this mermaid costume is too thin in some areas; and I wouldn't expect it not to last more than one child if this costume also is used as play gear. Which honestly at this price is what I would expect this type of quality and construction. I'm not trying to imply that this costume is made poorly; the material just isn't that high quality, super thick and stretchy, long lasting, costume kind. It's Walmart costume kind of material.

title: Very well made!
text:
I picked this up for my son who has dreamed about being a police officer since 4K. And this costume is just too perfect. I can't wait to see him in it was Halloween.
It feels very well made too. The fabric is noticably thicker then the material you would find in most box stores. And all of the pieces look high quality. I suspect they will last many rounds of dress up play once Halloween is over. It really is a nice set!!!

title: Works great!!!
text: My older kids are having an absolute blast with this jumbo bubble wand!!! I can not even begin to tell you how big some of these bubbles can get! We're all very impressed with this. It works great and it was so easy to use. So very much fun!

title: Exceptionally easy!!!
text: This concentrate has been working out amazing for us! The instructions are easy to follow and the bubbles are fantastic. They're big, rainbowy and fly quite a ways away before popping. It really is a nice solution. This definitely has made our summer more fun.

title: The kids love her
text:
I picked this up for my daughter's outdoor birthday party this past weekend and I am so happy that I did. This duck is just too cute!!! She worked very well and had all the kids laughing like crazy!!!
The only thing I don't love is that it is a little loud... But it's not too overwhelmingly bad cuz we are outside after all. The other thing I don't like is the tiny bubble solution refill hole in the top of the head. It is going to be a pain if we lose the little cap funnel that the duck came with. Guard that was your life! My kids have played with it daily since and the batteries have lasted over a week now. It added a ton of fun not just to the party, but to our backyard yard too!

title: Almost to sweet for words!
text: Guys, in person this plush is so much more adorable! The material truly is incredibly soft. The colors are bright and contrast well. And it feels very nicely made. My oldest was obsessed with the Baby Einstein take along music toy when his first year; And as soon as I push play on this octopus, he started bouncing along. "Mom, I remember these songs" he said. And my heart melted. I cannot recommend this a toy enough. It really would make an excellent but inexpensive shower gift, btw.

title: Everyone loved it!!!!
text:
This kit is just too adorable!!! I absolutely love that everything I needed to make a beautiful balloon arch was included in this kit! The colors are bright and it added so much fun!!!
We found all of the pieces to be of excellent quality. Truly. This was the fifth birthday party balloon strand I put together since Covid hit and I can say this one was very easy to do. But keep in mind is that this type of party decor is not a quick process. Balloon arches, in general, are time consuming!!! It took my husband and I several hours to put it together, from start to finish. And that was with us using a balloon pump (a must have, btw). But still balloon arches are worth every minute spent creating. I can't recommend this kit enough... I bet you'll be just as thrilled with the results as we were!

(Those 3m temporary wall hooks have worked very well for us when hanging... I also recommend buying those in advance.)

title: Too cute!!!
text:
This kit is just too adorable!!! I absolutely love that all the things I needed to make a beautiful Frozen themed balloon arch were included in this kit! Our daughter was extra thrilled with the blue streamers, which I hung above her bedroom door.
We found all of the pieces to be of excellent quality. Truly. This was the fourth birthday party strand I put together since Covid hit and I can say this one was very easy to use. But keep in mind is that this type of party decor is not a quick process. Balloon arches are time consuming. It took my husband and I several hours to put it together, from start to finish. And that was with is using a balloon pump (a must have, btw). But still it's worth every minute spent creating. I can't recommend this enough... I bet you'll be just as thrilled with the results!!!

title: "Seeds not included" should be made very clear
text:
As stated in my title, it was not clear on the front of the package or in the main description that the main ingredient, seeds, would need to be purchased separately AND prior to starting this kit. The instructions imply (assume) that most people have dried beans or lentils and their kitchen cupboards, so this shouldn't be a problem for most. Idk, those are not items I keep on hand. Beans and seeds can have an expiration date so I can understand why they want to included, but I also feel like that should have been made very clear from the get-go.
Beyond that, this really is a super cute kit. My 7yo is beyond thrilled. We found the instruction book easy to read and to follow, and my daughter has enjoyed the steps we've been able to complete so far. We also really like how this is an ongoing project, so overall I would consider it a really good value. All the pieces and 0arts are good quality and I expected they will last the entirety of the project.

title: Good entry level, beginner drone
text:
Easy to assemble and get started. You need to download the apps to use your phone, but it is easy to do.
This is definitely a beginner/entry level drone, but it is good for that purpose. Easy to get started and fly to get the hang of using a drone.
Battery time lasts about 10-15 minutes, but there are 2 included that charge pretty fast, so you can get some time in.
Crashed it a few times already learning, but it has not sustained any damage so far, pretty durable.
The included camera isnt the best, but it works for this price range
Certainly good for a first time drone user

title: Unique twist on survival board game
text:
This game comes with a LOT of high quality pieces for a low price for a board game. Most games with this many minis (48!!) are $50+. You get mechs, orcs, gladiators, all sorts of guys. The board is also very nice looking, very detailed.
The gameplay is easy enough, my 10 year old didn't have an issues following along with me in our first run through. Gather stones, power up, and survive. I REALLY like the game mechanic of pieces of the world (board) falling away as you play. That really makes you have to be on your toes for placement of your guys.
As others have mentioned, there is a print issue where the flood/sinkhole board space and card do not matchup, which is confusing. But overall a fun game with new ideas!

title: Adorable!!!
text: Now this is just too cute!!! Even more adorable once I took it out of the box! This caterpillar mat feels really well made. The fabric is thick but smooth, so it should be very easy to keep clean and free of pet hair. Plus it is bright and colorful and I love that it is gender neutral!!! Plus the mat is plenty thick and cushy feeling. I also liked how this mat was ready to go right out of the box, other I'm popping in two batteries. It's nice and compact, so it will be easy to store too. I have nothing but good things to say about this caterpillar playmat. I cannot wait to use this with the baby!!! This makes me smile from ear to ear.

title: So awesome
text: This lounge has been an excellent addition to our pool! Everyone fights over it all the time!!! It feels really well made. It is getting tons of use and abuse from my older kids and has managed to hold up over the past few weekends. We're all very happy with it!!!

title: Super convenient!
text: My kids are having a blast with these bubbles this summer! And I love that it's an easy to make solution. My kids can mix up a batch for themselves now! I will be back to buy these again, for sure!!!

title: Too cute!!!
text:
I picked these up to start training our 12-month-old puppy. She took to the "yes"
button right away. They're cute and pretty sturdy. If you're in the market a pair of yes/no buttons, I would recommend these.

title: Too cute!!!
text:
My oldest is now a preteen and we have been with Melissa and Doug from what feels like is "the beginning". Overall they are a fantastic and creative company, sometimes their products can be hit or miss. That isn't the case this time. This puzzle piece book is adorable. It truly is super cute!
I picked this up as something my youngest could put in her travel toy bag to take to grandma's. I'm excited to say after 2 weeks all the pizzas are still there! And Grandma says she plays with it almost everyday. The wood pieces are holding up well too. It's great and I'm going back to purchase the other two books!

title: Toddler and preschool STEM!!!
text:
Now this truck is just too cute. My bestie has been remodeling his kitchen over the last month, so our youngest has been in obsessed with 'hanyman' tools lately! This ended up being the perfect gift!!!
I catch him playing with the truck and accessories no less than three times a day (and we've had it here for several weeks). It's fun, it's creative and it's very well designed! Not to mention the fire truck and figures themselves remind me of FP little people, so it's a double win as far as I'm concerned. We've always enjoyed any toys made by educational insights and this has got to be one of their best so far! Simply excellent.

title: Best addition yet!
text: I absolutely love this floating chair and so does everyone else! I'll be picking up a second one soon just to keep everyone from fighting, lol! The plastic is thick and it feels well made. I suspect it will last several seasons. My favorite addition to our pool yet!

title: Cute little dice package with bonus
text:
I game a lot, so there is always a need for more dice, especially matching sets.
The dice are all nice quality, don't feel cheap, and roll true to what I have seen so far.
I especially like the "cream" dice, they are very nice to look at.
The Stamina potion cup looks surprisingly useful. I haven't used it yet, but the compacting cup with an included straw could certainly be helpful somewhere that you don't have your own drink container.
Very glad to add them to my ever growing dice collection!

title: Roll true, very nice selection of colors!
text:
I game a lot, so there is always a need for more dice, especially matching sets.
The dice are all nice quality, don't feel cheap, and roll true to what I have seen so far.
The color swirls are very nice, in line with some of the "big name" dice companies.
Very glad to add them to my ever growing dice collection!

title: So much fun
text: Our youngest just had an absolute last playing with this! He was incredibly excited when I pulled it out of the Amazon box. I've seen them playing with it at least two or three times a week! I would recommend it!!!!

title: Very cute!
text: I picked this up for my 8 and 10-year-old to do together and it turned out better than expect! These are really unique and adorable. The "cardboard" is thick and sturdy; enough so that the structures keep their shape as you are build them. It would have been frustrating otherwise. They are also bright and colorful.... And they even turned out bigger than I had anticipated. I did have to help a little here and there, but for the most part they were able to do this project themselves. And my kids were so proud, they gave them away as presents (one to grandma, and then each gave one to their summer school teacher). I would definitely recommend this cute paper craft kit.

title: Love them
text: We recently got a pool and these certainly have been a fun addition! My kids are having a blast!!! We're finding these floaties to be really well made too since my kids play with them incredibly rough! I haven't had to refill them since the first time I inflated them. I originally used an air pump to blow them up and they were ready to go in no time. They're cute and colorful... and they look great in our pool. And every time I see them, they make me smile. I would highly recommend these floaties!

title: Awesome
text: These are too much fun! We recently got a pool and these have been an excellent addition for the kids to play with. They're easy to blow up and are holding up very well to tons of rough play!!! Plus you get a ton in this set... Which is nice to have extras blown up so we don't have to jump in and out of the pool every time the one ball we are playing with goes flying. I would highly recommend them.

title: GREAT set of beginner/simple kites
text:
The kids have been asking to fly kites, but we are novices at best. Got this 3 pack (2 octopi, 1 rainbow).
These are made from rip proof nylon material, and they held up to some SUPER windy days so far.
Very easy to assemble, my 10 year old had no issues by himself. They are fun, and great to see soaring through the sky, especially the octopus! Great beginner kites, much better than some of those cheap $1 kites

title: Great, easy to use water fun!
text:
My kids LOVE water toys, and there are lots of options.
I think these may be the easiest to just get out there and play with.
They like squirt guns, but those take too long to refill constantly. I sent them outside with a bucket of water, and they were able to fill and refill quickly and easily with no problems, leading to a massive water fight!
The stood up to several hours of play with no issues so far, the plastic is good quality and does not appear cheaply made.

title: Cute!!!
text: I picked these up as extra stuffing presents for birthday party gift bags. They were great! They're bigger than most trinkets so these mini plushies really helped fill up the treat bigs nicely! I found them to be well made and the kids all thought they were adorable. They are running around showing each other and screaming "which one did you get". I would recommend them!

title: So much fun!!!
text:
These are just too cute! My daughter had seen them on YouTube and has been asking for them, so she was incredibly thrilled when I pulled these out of the Amazon box!
And unlike other blind bags, these feel like a good value because my daughter has gone back to play with them over and over again. Other blind bags we've had end up in the trash almost immediately and that feels like a waste. But not these; they feel like a real toy. Plus it was a two-pack, so my daughter couldn't have been happier about getting to open a second one! It is a really good value and we would highly recommend them!!!

title: Super cute
text:
My kids adore Blippi and his toys just as much! They see other YouTube kids playing with them and of course ask for Blippi everything all the time. So words cannot even tell you how excited they were when I pulled these lunch boxes out of the Amazon box.
These really are super cute blind bag toys. Blimpie and the accessories are made from a high-quality plastic; they are holding well to a lot of abuse. My two young kids play with these figures almost every day. We've certainly got their money's worth out of these. Especially
when I compare them to other blind bags that feel like a waste because they almost immediately end up in the trash. I would highly recommend this fun, surprise set!!!

title: Tons of fun!!!
text:
Words cannot tell you how excited my 6-year-old was when I pulled this VIP pets out of the Amazon package! After seeing many of her favorite YouTubers play with them, She's been asking for her own pet for months. Our girl already loves combing and braiding my hair (which I love too), but sometimes I don't have time to sit down. This was an excellent alternative; with a very long head of hair.... that has turned out to be even more fun to practice on than her own Mom's hair! I even braided it a couple of times for fun, lol.
Anyway, like most parents, I'm not a huge fan of overpriced blind bags. But this one feels like a good value, since it comes with a toy that is made for repetitive play. And not just made to be reused, but a toy my daughter wants to revisit over and over again. This blind bag surprise toy doesn't feel cheap, disposable or like a waste of money. We would both highly recommend it!

title: Lots of unique fun!!!
text:
My older kids (7 &10) had an absolute blast using this kit. Many phrases were thrown around like "we're real artists now" and "we could sell these for real money, lol.
The good: it is easy to use and it's not too messy. The bad: the jelly mix didn't dissolve all the way for us. The clumps may have affected the outcome a little, but the kids didn't really notice. The other thing is is it only comes with one tray, so I had to find a plastic Tupperware like container big enough for second kid to this project at the same time.
The colors are bold and bright if you want them, Or you can go lighter, fewer drops and get pretty pastels. There's enough in this kit for my two kids to do this project together at least one more time. We would all recommend it!

title: Small and didn't work
text:
I cannot recommend this kit. Unfortunately the telescope never worked for us. It was a disappointing "fail" for my daughter, who was originally so excited when this set came.... she's been asking to check out the stars for quite a while now.
In addition, I felt the microscope was really small, flimsy, and felt like it is made out of inexpensive plastic. It so tiny, it didn't fit the standard size slides we had on hand from an expansion kit. All of the parts ended up in the trash within a few days of opening the box.

title: The kids liked it a lot
text: My daughter has been asking for a crystal growing kit for a while now so she was so excited when I pulled this out of the Amazon box! It was easy to follow the instructions and we got pretty decent results. Our crystals didn't look quite as glorious as the cover, but my kids didn't care.
