They thought it was a really cool experiment to watch grow and had a blast checking and on it multiple times every day. I would recommend this stem project, it was fun!

title: Very cute!!!
text: My 7-year-old daughter loves her aqua beads! She pulls them out at least every other week to make someone a present. This is a cute little refill set. She's always worried about running out, so she was very excited when I pulled it out of the Amazon box! They're excellent for improving hand-eye coordination and truly do spark creativity. We love aqua beads, so much so we've given similar kits as gifts. I would highly recommend them!

title: Misleading
text:
I would not have been pleased had I purchased this set. The packaging is misleading in my opinion. For example, it shows a variety of colors included in this kit; but in reality we only get five colors of chalk sticks. With the exception of one red and one green "scented" stick. There is barely any scent in these two sticks; and none of the other chalk are scented from what I can tell. The chalk holders don't work well, as the chalk sticks easily fall out of the holders.
The spray chalk was a temporary hit with my kids; but that only lasted about 20 minutes. Plus the instructions show measuring the powder out with a cup that isn't included. And it was a bit messy getting the powder in the spray bottle. Eventually my kids started filling the water bottle with plain water and had more fun spraying things (like each other) with it instead of using the spray chalk. The stencils are flimsy and didn't work for us. Overall, I simply can not recommend this set.

title: Happy girl!
text: My 7-year-old is still obsessed with  anything ooey and gooey.... slime, fluff you name it, she loves it. And this product was no exception. She's played with it at least once a week and adores the different texture. She likes to bury toys for her little brother to find or use it like she would play sand. I personally found it no messier than any other product in this similar category.  I find and  appreciate that it is pretty easy to clean up, to be honest. I really do. We both would recommend it... It's a lot of fun!

title: A little small
text:
This review is for the face paint studio.
My 7-year-old daughter loves to sit down and paint her own face. She can do it for hours. These pants are easy for her to use and washed off easily. And the colors are fairly vibrant compared to other sets we've had. Yet, I didn't find any to stain her skin or her clothes. Oh and she really liked the extra sticker designs that came in the pack.
But at the time I wrote this review, the kit was listed for $15. I feel like that was a high for what came in this kit. One little tray of paint and three crayons, basically. I would expect this set to be closer to a $10 kit online; but also is a product that I would expect to find at the store Five Below (it's a dollar store where everything is $5 or less). I consider myself an artist and have been familiar with this brand for decades. So I was a little surprised, since Faber Castell usually knocks it out of the park.

title: Take a world tour from home with Ryan!
text:
Ryan toys always seem to have your kids going on an imaginary adventure, and the Tour Suitcase is no different. This set features Ryan figures from around the world!
You get 12 of the possible 80 figures, making it the biggest figure set that I am aware of. This feels like a much better deal than the kits that are mostly slime/putty. If you want the figures, this is the one for you.
Also has some country stickers that match the figures
Good luck collecting all 80!

title: Fun stretchy toy for kids! Hard to break
text:
Like the Stretch Armstrong toys of old, these Goo-Jit-Su toys are super stretchy gel based figures that appear to be almost indestructible. My kids have put these things through the ringer, and they are still going. They have literally tried to stretch them too far, and have had no luck thus far.
We have this set, as well as a Spiderman set, and the kids love them!
Smack them, stretch them, beat them up, they return to normal and keep on going.
Great fidget toy too!

title: Worked great for recent birthday decorations
text:
Nice compact kit that is easy to use and works great for powering out a ton of balloons!
My daughter's birthday was recently, and I had to blow up 100+ balloons for decorations. I would not have made it if it was not for this device. It gave a nice easy pressure to fill up the balloons, and with the attachments, you can do any style of balloon easily. Works GREAT!
The only downside is this thing is LOUD! It is like the air pumps at the gas station, loud whooshing noise. Best not to do late night when everyone is asleep

title: Coolest dice I have bought in a LONG time!
text:
I had high hopes for this dice set, they looked super cool.....
And I wasn't disappointed in the least! They are beautiful in design, dark grey steel color with dark green accents.
This is the first time I have seen hollow metal dice. I was concerned that they wouldn't be sturdy enough, and I would have to be worried about crushing/deforming them, but its not the case! They are very light but strong!
And of course, most importantly, they roll very nicely. They seem to be true weighed, and make a pleasant metallic noise when tumbling.
LOVE THESE DICE!

title: Some assembly required!
text:
This comes in a flat box, so you need to assemble it yourself. That was not hard, but you can certainly scratch the plastic if you aren't careful.
The pegs on stand are nice, all of my Lego brand figures stand on it nicely. Some brands are not so compatible, but this is nice.
Holding my favorite minfigs and protecting them from dust!

title: Great BIG dinosaur toy!
text:
I wish they had had dinosaur toys like this when I was a kid. They look so much more realistic!
Great sculpting and details. The attention to detail is accurate to the movies.
Has several fun play features featuring a GIANT biting jaw action.
Big, high quality dino toy for tons of fun!

title: Lots of pirate themed fun!
text:
If your kid likes Ryan's World, then they love minifigures and putty!
This is a fun little adventure chest they your kids can go digging for buried treasure!
Has some dress up items (foam sword, eyepatch), a dig and discover mini chest to find the key to the rest of the loot! Minifigures, putty, and a mini pirate ship are your prizes!
Similar to the rest of the Ryan mystery playsets, it is a bit overpriced, but if they love Ryan, there are fun new pirate themed figures for them to collect!

title: Movie not out yet, but nice figure with action moves!
text:
Being that the movie isnt out yet, it is hard to "recreate scenes from the movie", but this is high quality action figure with some fun accessories.
Great representation of LeBron James in his Tune Squad jersey. Comes with a mechanical looking backpack with arms that holds a basketball, and a bomb! Also has a big hammer from ACME.
Not sure what LeBron is going to do with these, but it looks like he means business! Cant wait to watch the movie with my kids

title: Fun figures, looks like a fun movie!
text:
Fun figures for the upcoming Space Jam movie!
There are several versions of each of the main cast members, LeBron, Daffy, Bugs, etc.
The figures are of nice quality PVC and my kids are having fun with them, even though they can't see the movie yet. I am sure it will make more sense once the movie releases

title: Overwhelmed
text: I picked this up for my daughter and I to do together, but it's a little too much for a child even with my help. The instructions are full of broken English, not in a logical order and hard to follow in my opinion. I think if you had done a kit like this before, it might be a easy fun project. But I can't recommend this for a first timer. I will say all of the pieces look nice and like they are made from decent quality materials.

title: Updated review
text:
Update: Broke after two weeks. Now when it is turned on, it makes a very loud, high pitched static/screeching noise, no matter the volume. The noise terrifies our pets and it is completely unusable.

Our 7yo loves anything Kidz Bop music, so I can't tell you how excited she was when I pulled this out of the Amazon box!!! The microphone is really easy for her to use on her own with out any help. She's spent hours in front of the mirror, singing and dancing away! And I like that it's not obnoxiously loud, lol. I truly can't recommend this toy enough!!! It would make an excellent gift for any kid who loves to sing.

title: A lot of fun!!!
text:
This is an adorable sewing kit! This is my daughter's third one, but I still would consider this a good beginner set for a first timer. Everything you need comes in the box; including extra threaders (the red plastic with the wire diamond coming out one end). Honestly, having a threader on hand can make or break a sewing experience! They're incredibly cheap (a dollar at the box store), but unless you've been around someone who sowed by hand, most people don't know this game changing product exists! And No other kid kit has ever included one before!!!! So incredibly thoughtful. In my opinion, the treader is truly the one piece that needs to be included in with any hand sewing project kit, if a manufacturer is going to market their product as something children can do independently!
My 7-year-old was able to do the vast majority of these without any help and followed the instructions with ease. This set kept her busy all weekend. She opened the box after school on a Friday and had all of them done by Sunday night. Plus her hand and I coordination has improved so much since she's taken up sewing. I can't recommend is enough!!!

title: So cool!!!
text:
My husband has dabbled in magic, juggling, and trickery for years. He has a fair amount of downtime at his job (without access to the internet), so this is one of the types of fidgets he has on him to keep himself occupied. This ball is really awesome for keeping his skills sharp!
The globe is really nice and feels well made. It is perfectly smooth and perfectly weighted. It's more of a red leaning orange color in my opinion; but it is eye-catching and easy to see. Highly recommend!

title: Love them!
text: These are really cute. They stick to the fridge well and my kids are having a blast creating sentences. We had adult versions of these 20 years ago and I forgot how much fun they were! Highly recommended!!!

title: Very cute art set.
text: This kit is just too cute. My daughter was beyond thrilled when I pulled it out of the Amazon box. I like thay it came with everything she needed and she had an absolute blast. My only complaint was that she refused to stop after painting the first unicorn. She had all three done by the end of the evening. I kind of hope to have a last a few days, but she loved it too much.  We would both highly recommend this set! It would make a great gift!!!

title: Lots of fun
text: I picked these up for my youngest, but honestly all of my kids have used these cups a ton! For both sorting and playing. They're made out of thick plastic and the colors are bright and pretty. We really like them and I'd recommend them!

title: So much fun!!!
text: Probably just like yours, my kids love anything Pokemon. So I can't even tell you how excited my kids were when I pulled this out of the box. My 7 year old daughter and 10 year old son put it together easily, with no help needed from the adults. I think my daughter liked it more than our son, lol. She was so proud. We would recommend it, for sure!

title: Lots of fun!!!
text: My daughter absolutely loves True so I can't tell you how excited she was when I pulled this out of the Amazon box!!! It's a really cute set and it should keep her busy for quite a long time. We've had a couple of these kits so far and they are perfect for the car. Plus, Imagine Ink books have always been a massive hit with all my kids. Recommended, for sure!!!

title: Sturdy attractive container for all of your card storage needs
text:
I got this to store my son's ever-growing Pokemon card collection.
- Sturdy construction, plastic is thick and has not cracked/broken
- Latches are secure and sturdy as well
- Attractive blue color and nice, scratch resistant clear cover lid
- Holds over 2000 cards, so nice and big for a bigger collection

title: Magically enchanting!!!
text:
My 7-year-old absolutely adored this kit! I wasn't sure if it was going to be a big hit because it didn't see how "mixing up some glitter" was going to be a lot of fun at first. But holy cow was I wrong! So very wrong!!!
My daughter has had an absolute blast with this. It's really kept her busy and she continued to be super proud of her creations, so I think it is a good value. The only bad thing I have to say is we wish it came with more bottles. But I still can not recommend it enough! It would make a great gift! I'm excited to buy her the unicorn kit for her next birthday!!!
Update: the unicorn kit is just as cool! She loved both!!!!

title: Very pretty
text: This is a cute little fidget toy. The colors are great and it feels well made. My daughter has been dancing around with us for hours already. She hasn't put it down since I pulled it out of the Amazon box. Highly recommended!

title: Worth it, don't hesitate
text: Kids love it!!! My 6 year old often needs help, but that's ok because my husband has a lot of fun too! Excellent STEM gift!!!

title: Very cool!!!
text:
These are just so cool!!! I picked up these pirate coins to go with a "create your own board game" kit I am working making. Based off of an inside family joke, one half of our game's theme is pirate ships. These tokens are the perfect addition!
I was impressed with how heavy these coins felt once they were in my hands. They're weighted really well in my opinion. And they are not cheap and flimsy looking either. I'd highly recommend them!!!

title: So much fun!
text:
My six year old has always been obsessed with rocks and everyone here loves board games, so this game is a ton of fun for our family! What a great way to learn new and interesting information, as well as a way to learning how to pronounce difficult words.
The stuff that comes in the set is really nice. Ours came with more than the 25 rocks; and they were all very pretty. A huge assortment of shapes and sizes.
And technically you can place dozens of different types of games with this set, since the set has a standard 52 card deck. But we've really only played bingo and memory so far since all family members of varying ages can participate in those games. Overall, we'd recommend it. Both the bingo cards and 52 card deck are thick (not cheesy or flimsy). The graphics are pretty and the facts are interesting. We have a lot of fun when we pull this game out!

title: Kids love them!!!
text:
Both my 8 and 10-year-old love Dog Man book series! My oldest has been reading them for 3 years now. So it's really great to see a Dog Man "toy" on Amazon!
My kids had a lot of fun constructing these figures and equally as much fun playing with them afterwards. They're made out of a thicker paperboard, so they while last a little while. The instructions were easy enough for my kids to follow on their own. We'd highly recommend these to any Dog Man fan! Tons of fun!!!

title: Lots of fun!!!
text:
This is a fun and quick card game! My 7 and 10-year-old love teaming up against their dad and I! They just giggle and giggle every time they win a round!
The game was very easy to learn and it stays exciting the entire time. We've played Mustachio maybe a dozen times in this last few weeks. I'd highly recommend it, it's a blast!!!

title: She loved it!!!
text:
If you're reading this review, I bet your child loves Ryan as much as ours does! This egg was high on her wishlist, so words can't even begin to explain how thrilled she was when I pulled it out of the Amazon box! This would be our fourth Ryan egg now (we also had series 1, 2 & 3) and this was our most impressive egg yet!
The egg's four figures and drone she received were cool and not duplicates of any figures she has from other sets. The thing I liked the best about this surprise egg is everything included was built to last this round. Nice hard durable plastic figures. No squishy figures that eventually pop and ooze jelly or any of that nonsense. She also liked the cards and spinner a lot. She has played with everything in this egg everyday since opening it. This really would make a great gift for a Ryan fan. We'd both recommend it!!!

title: Good but not perfect
text:
I found this to be a nice kit at a really good price. But the balloons did give me some trouble at the beginning. I took away a star because the kit came with picture instructions (no words) and the pictures were very small thumbnail images and drawn poorly, all cartoon like. So the institutions did not help me in anyway. But since this was my first time filling DIY blow up Mylar balloons at home, I suspect some of my difficulty was probably due to beginner error. I had a lot of trouble filling up the first three balloons until I got the hang of it. After that, filling the rest was a breeze.
But overall, the majority of the balloons were really easy to fill and seal off. It looked awesome once I had it all hung up and my son was so very happy! I put this banner together two weeks ago and moved the balloon to his bedroom a couple of days after his birthday. It's still holding up great. The balloons are just as inflated as they where the night I blew them up.

title: She loved this!!!
text: You guys, words can't express how excited my 6yo was when I this slime kit out of the Amazon box! Slime is one of her most favorite things in this world, so this was perfect for her.  She had a blast making both slimes and has continued to play with them afterwards. The colors were bright but didn't transfer; and it isn't too messy of a project in my opinion. For how long it kept her busy, I think the price was right. We can't recommend this kit enough!

title: Fun twist!!!
text:
Uno truly is the most played game in our house and we've had several versions over the years (traditional, emoji, minions, etc). And honestly, all of our decks are looking a little rough simply because they are made out of traditional cardstock. Personally, I was very excited to see a laminated version of these cards. They're just so sturdy now! Plus I love the added bonus of them storing easily on a ring!
As far as the Flip variant to this goes, my kids like this even more than the original Uno game! They think it's hilarious to flip to the dark side... and they just giggle and giggle when they get to play one of the dark side's penalty cards. If you're at all familiar with the original game, you'll have no problems learning this retake. All of us highly recommend it!!!

title: **Snow** and bathtub fun too!!!
text:
Our youngest is obsessed with Disney cars and this color changing line couldn't be more awesome!!! I can't tell you how excited he was when I pulled this out of the amazon box. And when he first saw the car change colors, he was mind blown. He was shocked and screeched endlessly!!!
He has since asked to play with this set every day since we got it. And he plays with it longer than any other toy we own. To make it even more exciting, I put some snow in the cup instead of ice cold water today. That was a new layer of fun.
I can't wait to buy him more color changers. They're by far his favorite toy in this last year. Disney Cars color changers are great in the bathtub too (with a bucket of snow or ice water on the side). Any Cars fan will love them. I can't recommend them enough!!!

title: So much fun!
text:
This batman is so cool!!! My oldest has severe ADHD and fidgets contently. He has always had a fidget toy in his hands. Plus he loves superheros. This couldn't be a better mash-up toy.
He's had it for a couple of weeks and has played with it every day. It still looks like it is still brand new and it feels really well made. Plus it's super stretchy and the bats in his chest is really cool. Our son also has a larger Heroes of Goo spiderman that he loves just as much. He says these were by far his favorite toys of 2020. We'd both recommend them a lot. I will be buying him more, for sure!!!

title: Awesome!!!
text:
My 10yo absolutely loves the Hero's of Goo line. They're by far his favorite toy this year! I can't even tell you how excited he was when I pulled Blazagon, the Dragon out of the Amazon box! My son has severe ADHD and he fidget's contently. And as of late, he one of these Heros of goo characters in his hands all the time. And I can't blame him. I even think they're a lot of fun to stretch over and over again.
This red figure is just as nice as all the others. Which ever Goo figure you go with, I doubt your child will be disappointed. These make an amazing gift. We'd both highly recommend them!!!

title: Good size
text: We're are happy with this pinata! It was easy to fill and holds plenty of candy. lt took about a dozen swings before it started bust open... and another five or six swings before the candy started falling out. The kids absolutely loved it.  It's the perfect addition any birthday party.

title: So exciting!!!
text:
My daughter and I can't recommend this doll enough. She opens up a whole world of imaginative play (much like the show), but of course the accessories help a lot. Since our 6yo simply loves the Cave Club youtube show... and of course has been asking for all of their dolls. I can't tell you how excited she was she opened the amazon box!
Now that we've gotten to play with a couple of the dolls in person, they are as neat as they are on the show. Their hair and cloths are colorful, funky and fun. My daughter loves that each doll comes with a ton of accessories. She is also a huge animal lover, so her favorite part is the pets that come with each doll.
I think these dolls are a really good value, considering the accessories that are included. And Mattel is excellent brand and you can trust their quality. I can't imagine any Cave Club fan not being thrilled to get any one of these dolls as a gift. They are seriously adorable!!!

title: So cool!!!
text: My oldest two kids absolutely love polished rocks and this set is so neat and pretty!!! The stones were on the small size, but that's ok, because that just meant more were included! When I ordered these, I didn't think two pounds of rocks was going to be a whole lot to be honest.... but I was pleasantly surprised at just how much two pounds actually was in person. More than enough for them to not fight over. My whole family recommends these!!!

title: Loudest toy ever lol!
text:
If you remember Hungry Hungry Hippos, then you will get an idea as to how loud this game is. As expected, the point is to mash the buttons and drop the hammer on your opponent. My kids did have a great time playing with it for awhile, but make sure to have them play in their rooms. Between the button smashing and the laughing and screaming from playing, this is a loud game haha.
The hammer is quite light, so it there is no real threat of any "smashing" going on, but it is still fun. With how hard my kids were going at it, I am not sure if it will hold up that long, the construction seems to be a little on the flimsy side. At this point, 4 stars is about right. Fun, but we'll see how long that lasts

title: More great builds from Mega Construx!
text: This is the second HeMan (MOTU) build that I have gotten from Mega, and like the Tower one I previously did, the build is of great quality and the "minifigures" are awesome! As a child of the 80s, building sets and HeMan are a fun throwback, and I am looking forward to more sets in this line!

title: Nice toy!
text: My ten year old likes this Rubik's figure a lot! More than I expected, to be honest. He has severe adhd an fidgets with toys constantly. He's held this figure in his hands for hours so far, just flipping all the pieces around. Plus this figure feels very sturdy and well made. I don't think he'll ever break it. Besides, it's fun and cute so my other kids are jealous, lol. We'd recommend it!

title: Cute set for boys and girls!
text: This set is great! We have a lot of hobby artists in this house and we love doing a variety of craft projects! My kids occasionally find a hand painted rock when out on our walks and have been asking to paint some to leave for others. So this set is awesome starter kit for all three of my kids to do together! We got everything we needed to get started. They had a ton of fun, both painting and later hiding the rocks around the neighborhood! I'd recommend it!!! It was a lot of fun.

title: Very cool stem gift!!!
text:
I ordered this for my oldest son because we've loved all the Playz kits we've owned... and was surprised to find all three of our kids found this set very interesting. They all hovered around this playset and each kid was able to take turns helping their dad put it together. Initially, it took a bit longer for them to put together than I expected; but looking back at it, it really is a huge set with a ton of pieces! And the next day, my 6 year old daughter and I had a blast painting the planets.
This really is a cool stem toy that has a lot of value beyond the original build. They've pulled it down off the shelf and played with it every day since receiving it. I'd say their favorite part is turning off all the lights in their room and looking at the planets that they can light up on the ceiling. And the older two already have all the planets names memorized in the correct order already. I'd highly recommend this kit. It would make an excellent gift!!! Thanks Playz! We love you!!!

title: A lot of fun!
text:
My 6 1/2 year old daughter was so excited when I pulled this DIY pillow kit out of the Amazon box!!! It was a fun project for her to do mostly by herself. I did needed to help a little bit here and there with things like treading the needle and lining up the pieces. But for the most part, she was able to do this art project by herself.
I would consider this a nice, high quality set. Flip sequins is super popular these days and the sequin owl is the nicest flip one she has owned so far. It's really well made with many different colors. The only thing I didn't love about the pillow is I wish it had came with more stuffing. But my daughter didn't notice or complain. I'd recommend this kit a lot!

title: Very cute
text: Nice set!

title: Nice set
text:
My 4th grade son had similar counting blocks at school and his teacher told me she would give them to him to fidget with during math lessons. Our schools have been closed since spring of 2020 (due to covid) and like many parents, I've been struggling with keeping him focused here at home. We're all so happy that we picked this up.
These blocks sit with him on his school desk at home. All day long, he is constantly fidgeting with them. Sorting them by color, stacking them, making little things, etc. It's extra impressive because his desk is surrounded with a ton of legos, which used to be his favorite school time fidget toy. I think he like these better, being simpler type of stacking block. He can still fidget stack without getting too distracted. His teacher said on chat today she has noticed his focus has sharpened as well over this last two weeks.
This block set is also great for math lessons, as they're originally intended, lol. I have borrowed them from him time to time to use with my 1st grader; to help her visually with math as well. Highly recommended... Great STEM
Toy in my opinion.

title: Fun activity book kit!
text:
Our 6yo loves JoJo! So she was very excited when I pulled this set out of the Amazon box!!!
Now that she's gotten to use them, I can assure you they are as neat as they in the photo. The Magic Ink book is by far her favorite of the three. But all three are keeping her plenty busy (which I really appreciate 8 months into social distancing in 2020). The grab & go kit was cute and she's having fun adding stickers to all of her art work. I think these set is a good value, considering how much time it will take her to use up all three "books". They are seriously adorable. Can't recommend this bundle enough!

title: So much fun!!!
text:
Our youngest is going on 4 years old and is a huge Disney Cars fan!!! He was so excited to receive these!!!
They make bath time even more fun than before. I often let him play with these cars in there with a bucket of ice water on the side (or better yet, scoop up a bucket of snow, if it's the right season!) Seriously, these are awesome. Well worth every penny and more. I'd highly recommend them!!!

title: So cute!!!
text: All three of our kids love Pokemon, so they were really excited to get this set. The figures are made out of a thick plastic and feel like they will last a long time. My kids would highly recommend them!!!

title: So much fun!!!
text:
Our 4yo loves all things Paw Patrol! So I can't tell you how excited he was when I pulled this playset out of the Amazon box!
And now that we've gotten to play with it in person, I can assure you it is even cooler than it looks in the pictures. It feels really durable and is made out of a high quality plastic. And my son just loves how big it is and all the lights and sounds that came with it. It is by far his most favorite toy at the moment and the launcher is his most favorite part. And since he already had all the paw patrol figures (passed down from older siblings and cousins), this Cruiser fit right into his current collection nicely. I can't imagine any Paw Patrol fan not being thrilled to get any this as a gift. It's seriously adorable. Can't recommend this enough!

title: Fun but CREEPY!!!
text:
Let me begin by saying I hate spiders. With every cell in my body, I am gawd awfully terrified by them. So I can't believe I ordered this for my kids. With that said, my kids are absolutely thrilled by this toy!!!
From the second I pulled this out of the amazon box, they have been completely geeked out by it. They've played with it every day... several times a day. It even gets our puppy excited and she loves chasing it across the floor. We've haven't even had it for a full two weeks yet, but it is holding up great. It seems very well made. The batteries haven't needed replacing yet and really the spider itself shows no signs of wear. The remote control was self explanatory and my kids took to it without needing the instructions. I'd have to honestly highly recommend it.

title: So very neat!
text:
My husband grew up playing tons of pinball and couldn't love the game more. I'm not sure who was more exited to see this when I pulled it out of the amazon box, him or the kids!!!
His love aside, I have to say this is a really cool toy. It's totally "STEM", which I always appreciated in a toy these days. They found it easy to put together, so the construction part of this toy was fun as well as educational (the hubs said the instructions were easy to follow too). And once it was put together, everyone has had a blast playing with it since.
Being a a Melissa and Doug product, you know it's a brand you know you can trust. This would make an amazing gift. We would all recommend this highly educational toy! It's really that cute!!!

title: Pretty cool!!!
text:
All three of our kids are obsessed with Super Mario anything, so I can't tell you how excited they were when I pulled this playset out of the Amazon box! Now that we've gotten to open it, I can promise it is even cooler than it appears in the pictures.
I think this toy is a really good value, since you get so many figures in this set. The pieces are made out of high quality plastic and they feel really durable. Plus the ghost truly glows in the dark (it's their favorite part). Any Mario fan would be thrilled to get this as a gift. It really is that awesome! Can't recommend this playset enough!

title: Massive hit!!!
text:
Our 6yo loves Ryan from youtube! She's been obsessed with him for the last three years and was so excited to see this toy on his show. She's been asking for this playset nonstop, so words can't explain how crazy excited she when I pulled this one out of the amazon box!!!
Now that we've gotten to play with it in person, I can promise you it is even cooler than it looked on Ryan's show. It's made out of a thick, durable plastic. And the accessories are really cool. It grabbed all of my kids attention and all three have had a blast playing with the launcher! But if you were to ask my daughter, she'd tell you this was the coolest toy she got in 2020. I can't imagine any Ryan fan not being absolutely thrilled to get any this playset. Can't recommend it enough!

title: Well made and a super good value!!!
text:
My daughter loves this playset! She is 6yo and has a few AG dolls already, but the accessories are so expensive!!! I love that other companies are making compatible toys at an affordable price. She's had it for a couple of weeks now and has played with it almost every day. Taking orders and serving "the customer" is her favorite part of this set.
This playset comes with so many adorable accessories. Everything is made out of a durable plastic (no cheap paper inserts, like menus or shopping lists, that some manufactures will count as an "accessories"). Everything else feels just as well made too. The drive thru is nice and sturdy.

The stand alone opens up a whole world of imaginative play, but of course the accessories help a lot! I also appreciate that this set was ready to go right out of the box. Meaning no assembly required. And that's an awesome bonus during the holidays. This would make a great gift. Both my daughter and I can't recommend this set enough.

title: Really cool!!!
text:
My girls had a lot of fun with this set!!! We're all hobby artists and they've been asking to try resin since the see it occasionally on youtube. This kit was a great introduction to resin for us!
The instructions were easy to follow and it was mostly "mess-free". It cleaned up easy enough though. The molds were high quality and they glitter plenty sparkly. The jelli set really quick and came out easily, so that was nice. I also think it was a good value, since there is enough left over to do it again. This would make a great gift!!! My daughter's really enjoyed this kit! Highly recommended!!!

title: Super cute!!!
text: I picked this up for my daughter (who is 6yo) and realized it was a little above her skill set, so my niece delightfully accepted this journal. She said it is a lot of fun and her favorite part is the scratch offs.  My sister (her mom) says she's seen her using it every day since she got it. It feels well made and a good value.

title: Adorable set
text: I've been buying my kids Melissa and Doug toys for the last ten years because of their amazing quality toys. This set is just as awesome as any other pretend play set we've owned from them. Plus, you get so many accessories in this set, it is crazy. The pieces are well made and feel like they'll hold up for many years to come. My girls are having a fabulous time playing with all of the pieces. They play with it nearly every day and have the absolute most fun putting (fake) makeup on daddy. Highly recommended, by all of us!!!

title: Love this set!!!
text:
My 6yo is a true artist, so we just love Kahootz products. This Fantastic Flowers set is just as awesome as the others we already own. We have their Spirograph set, the Dress press, and all the Fashion Plates (plus add-ons). She's already cycles between the other sets constantly, so this Fantastic Flowers set was the perfect addition and mixed things up a bit!!!
The press is is easy to use enough for her to use on her own and she is so proud of her creations. We'll run out of the pretty paper that comes with it eventually, but I have plenty of cardstock and scrap booking paper on hand for when that happens. I'm not going to lie, I even have fun creating flowers with her. While the Kahootz fashion plates are a fun, retro throwback that pulls on my childhood heartstrings, this floral set might secretly be my favorite set of theirs yet!!! Great job and thank you Kahootz!

title: Nice set!!!
text:
Our oldest is obsessed with Beyblades! His cousin and him play together all the time. So I can't tell you how excited he was we pulled this out of the Amazon box! Now that we've gotten to open it, I can promise they're even cooler than they appears in the pictures. He's played with them nearly every day since he's gotten them.
I'd have to say I think this set is a really good value. The pieces are high quality and they feel really durable. Any BB fan would be thrilled to get this as a gift. I can't wait to get him more for Xmas! Can't recommend this set enough!

title: Very cute!!!!
text: It's fall of 2020 and our schools are closed due to covid. It's been hard to find indoor creative indoor activities that have held my son's interest, but he thought this one was really cool. It was easy for him to do and it came with more than enough paint. Clean up was a breeze too, it came right off of his hands. I'd recommend this set!!!!

title: Super fun!!!
text:
Our oldest is obsessed with Marvel and DC, so I can not tell you how excited he was we pulled this out of the Amazon box! And now that we've gotten to open it, this blind bag surprise was so much cooler than it appears in the pictures.
Our son had much fun opening all of the blind bags. His Imaginext batcave is probably one of his most favorite toys, so these figures were an excellent addition. And I think this surprise set was a really good value. Like all things Imaginext, the pieces are made out of high quality plastic. They're incredibly durable. Any Super Hero fan would be thrilled to get this as a gift. It really is that awesome! I'll be getting him a second one for Xmas for sure! Can't recommend this enough!

title: She loved this set!!!
text:
Our 6yo is obsessed with Ryan. She's been watching him for a couple of years now so of course she has always asked for all of his toys. For every birthday and holiday. So I can not tell you how excited she was we pulled this figure set out of the Amazon box! And now that we've gotten to open it, I can promise she was even more impressed with it than what I expected from looking at the pictures. They're her new favorite thing and she has been playing with the figures multiple times a day!
I think this surprise blind bag set is a really good value. The figures are pieces are made out of high quality plastic and they feel as durable as our season one Ryan toys. I can promise any Ryan fan will be thrilled to get this as a gift! It really is that cool!!! I'm considering picking up a second set for her for Xmas as well as other Ryan toys! Can't recommend this enough!

title: Super cool!!!
text:
Our 6yo is still obsessed with Ryan. He's been her favorite for a couple of years now and constantly is asking for all of his toys. I can not tell you how excited she was we pulled this mystery case out of the Amazon box!
Now that we've gotten to open it, I can promise it is even cooler than it appears in the pictures. She had a ton of fun opening all of the blind bags and three compartments. The whole kit probably took an hour or so to open (with breaks to play with each section); but she's been playing with it every day since.
I think this blind bag toy is a really good value. The pieces are made out of high quality plastic and they feel as durable as our season one Ryan toys (which are still holding up great). Any Ryan fan would be thrilled to get this as a gift.... it really is that awesome! I'll be getting her more Ryan toys for Xmas, for sure! Can't recommend this enough!

title: So much fun!!!
text:
I loved my marble run as a kid, so I was super excited to give this set to my kids. All of them are having a blast playing with this set. I'd probably recommend it for kids 5 and up. My 6yo still needs help here and there, but my 9yo has no problem building some pretty amazing set ups.
It's a great STEM activity too because it requires pre-planning, while learning about balance and gravity. And cooperation between siblings and friends when building together. The pieces are easy to put together. Plus the options are endless; I doubt my kids have ever built any run anything like the last. I'd highly recommend this set!

title: A lot of fun!
text:
Our son loves Fortinte! Anything and all things Fortnite. He's seen most of the toys on youtube and has been asking for all of them; so I can't tell you how excited he was when I pulled Pelly out of the Amazon box.
Now that we've gotten to play with this, I can assure you the all the kids found him as much fun as he looks in the pictures. Even his younger siblings are having fun playing with it. It was a little smaller than I was expecting and we've all had trouble getting the banana man to balance. But the kids don't care because they all think the skateboard is really cool and have had a lot of fun finding other toys to balance on it. Plus my son is happy just having a Peely figure on it's own.
For how much my oldest loves it, I think it was a good value (at the time I wrote this review). Considering it comes with accessories too. It seems sturdy and well made. The skateboard has withstood plenty of crashes so far. I can't imagine any Fortnite fan not being thrilled to get this as a gift. Can't recommend it enough!

title: Awesome STEM toy!!!
text:
I picked this up for my youngest, but all two older grade kids have been having a blast playing with it too! Because it comes with so many accessories, my kids don't fight when playing together with this one!!!
We love all thing Melissa and Doug, and this is one of their coolest toys yet in my opinion. Its not just a toy, since there is a strong educational aspect going on too. It got us talking about good oral hygiene and it got my kids more curious human body too! I honestly can't recommend this toy enough!!! I'll be buying a second one for my niece.

title: Loving it
text:
The kids are having a blast playing with this toy!!! I'd highly recommend it.
It's fall of 2020, our schools are closed and we're still heavily social distancing. Like most people, it's been a boring 8 months already. So this outdoor hide and seek game has been a great addition to our outside fun. It really helped get the kids interested in playing outside again, plus gives them good exercise. This game includes plenty of running around and lots of moving.
I think the kids like hiding the gems more than the like finding them, lol. The battery life seems to be good so far and so much more fun to play at night. And the toy feels durable. We all had fun!!! I'm looking forward to buying the kids another Starlux light up toy for xmas this year!

title: Very useful set!!!
text:
Our schools have been closed (due to Covid) since last spring and it's now mid fall. I've started to notice my daughters handwriting is suffering. Our school provided us with a lap top and good online instruction, there is a severe lack hand writing practice beyond math work. So I'm finding these Highlights books have been an excellent addition to home schooling.
My daughter's favorite part of this set is the wipe-off books. But all the books are equally great in my opinion. They're well written, are interesting and they hold her attention well. They're high quality books from a brand you can trust. To be honest, this set seemed a little pricey to me at first. But then I realized it worked out to less than $4 a book (at the time I wrote this review). And I think that's a good value. I'd highly recommend this set. It's been great!

title: Super cool!
text:
It's the Nov of 2020 and our schools have been closed (due to Covid) since last spring. And while our school provided us with a lap top and plenty of online instruction, I've noticed there is a severe lack hand writing practice. These Highlights books have been an excellent addition so far to home schooling.
My daughter's favorite part of this set is the wipe-off books. But all the books are equally great in my opinion. They're well written, interesting and hold her attention well. They're high quality books from a brand you can trust. They seemed a little pricey at first, but then I realized it worked out to less than $4 a book (at the time I wrote this review). I think that's a good value. I'd highly recommend this set.

title: Coolest toy of 2020!!!
text:
We've been huge Imaginext fans for years! Their toys have always been high quality and very durable. They're on the pricey side, but I happily buy them because I believe the value is there. And this new massive Batcave is no exception!
I can not tell you how excited my kids were when I pulled this out the Amazon box! They've had it for a couple of weeks now and have played with it nearly every day. It comes with a lot of extra figures and accessories that help keep the imaginary play going for hours. Not to mention the lights and sounds are awesome! (they sounds aren't too loud or annoying on the lower setting, btw). The bad guys talking is by far my boys favorite part. And did I mention this playset is huge??? Two kids can easily play with it at one time!
I can't imagine one bad thing to say about it. I suppose if I had to say anything, the only negative experience we had was right away but still our own fault. It needs four C batteries (which we didn't have when on hand when it arrived) and took us about 20 minutes to take it out of the box and put the whole thing together. I'd highly recommend setting it up before you show your kids it or they just linger around behind you whining every 30 seconds about why you're taking so long to put it together, lol! But beyond that, any kid would be thrilled to have this. It really is one of the coolest playsets (if not the absolute best one) that I have ever seen! Thank you so much Imaginext.... it will bring our kids years and years of happiness!!!

title: Super cool!!!
text:
My two oldest kids love making slime... but I'll admit I am terrible at it. I can make the basic slime recipe... but any of the specialty slime projects we've ever attempted (like cloud slime, galaxy slime, etc), never turn out for us like it shows in the pictures/videos. It's so frustrating. So we think these easy-to-follow, all in one, Elmer's kits are amazing!!!
In fact, my 6 & 9 year old didn't even need my help making it! The whole process really was that kid friendly. The cloud slime turned out perfect and they've continued to play with it after school just about every day now. Can't recommend these super fun Elmer's slime kits enough!!!

title: This is really cool!!!
text:
My two youngest kids have been a fan of Ryan for years!!! They're obsessed actually. So words can't express how excited my kids were when they saw me pull this out of the Amazon box!!! And since my kids watch nothing by Ryan on youtube, all they do is ask for is his toys for their birthday's and holidays. I'm surprised to say his toys bring my kids so much joy, they have become one of the few things I am willing to pay full retail price for!
So now that we've gotten to open this vault, I can promise it was even more thrilling than it appears in the pictures! Both kids had a blast opening all of the "layers" and the blind bags that were included. They've played with the figures and the spy accessories nearly constantly since unpackaging everything last weekend.
I think this mystery box toy is a really good value. I love that the vault itself isn't disposable... they're still playing with it all by itself too. The pieces in the blind bags are made out of decent plastic and they feel really durable compared to the first round of Ryan toys from two years ago. Plus you get so many accessories in this set, it's ridiculous. I promise any Ryan fan would be thrilled to get this as a gift. It really is that awesome! Can't recommend this vault enough!

title: So much fun!!!
text:
My youngest and I can't recommend this book enough! He is a huge Blue's Clue's fan! All three versions with Steve, Joe, and Josh! So words can't explain how excited he was I pulled this book out of the Amazon box!
Now that we've gotten to play with this read along book in person, I can assure you it is even cooler than it looks in the pictures. My son loves all the lights and sounds. He's had this book for nearly a week and has "played" with it multiple time. And it keeps him busy for 20-30 minutes at a time!
The book is thick and feels really well made. And coming from Leapfrog, you already know you it's a brand you can trust. I can't imagine any Blue's Clues fan not being thrilled to get this a gift. It really is that adorable.

title: So cool!!!
text:
Our 3 & 6yo absolutely love Ryan and his youtube channel! My oldest has been a fan for years and asks for every single Ryan toy she sees advertised. Words can not explain how excited the kids were when I pulled this mystery surprise set out of the amazon box!!!
And now that we've gotten to open it all, I can promise both kids thought it was an awesome experience. They really enjoyed opening the blind bags slots and neither of them have stopped playing Ryan figures since. I think this surprise toy was a really good value (seeing as how you get 10 figures!!!) and it's a really great way to catch up on any Season 1 figures you may have missed. I can't imagine any Ryan fan not being thrilled to get this set as gift. My kids can't recommend thy figures enough! It really is that cool.

title: Fun and unique!!!
text:
Our 9 & 6yo absolutely love the FGTeeV youtube channel! So they were both very excited when I pulled this mystery elevator surprise toy out of the amazon box.
And now that we've gotten to open it, I can promise both my kids thought it was just as cool as last seasons red elevator. They really enjoyed opening the blind bags enclosed and neither of them have stopped playing with the toys since.
I think this surprise toy was a really good value, considering how many blind bags you get inside. I can't imagine any FGTeeV fan not being thrilled to get this as a gift. My kids can't recommend them enough! It is really cool.

title: Super fun!!!
text:
All of my kids absolutely loved this prank bot!!! They've played with Prankbro for hours so far!
The remote control was super easy for my kids to learn and so were the features. They think it is so funny to send the robot into each other's rooms to tease one another. They find the farting feature absolutely hilarious and they also like setting up toys for the robot to punch down. We'd all highly recommend it. It would make a great gift!

title: Just adorable!!!
text:
My 6yo LOVES her AG dolls, but my husband's wallet does not! They're just so expensive. I am so happy other companies are making compatible dolls at an affordable price!!!
This doll in particular is just too cute. My daughter has had her for about a week now and has played with her every day. She just loves her hair!!! This doll feels well made too. It is nice and sturdy; and everything is made out of a thick, durable plastic.
My daughter and I can't recommend this beauty enough. An extra doll opens up a whole world of imaginative play. This one is a great choice and would make a great gift!!!

title: We LOVE Munchkin bath toys!
text:
I've been buying my kids Munchkin bath toys for a decade now and they never disappoint! They're always well made and really easy to clean.... and their bath toys rarely collect mold or mildew (in our experience).
And this set has been no exception. It comes with so many things, so I think it is a great value. My music loving 2yo absolutely adores this set!!! And the instruments themselves aren't too loud or annoying. This set would make an excellent gift. We highly recommend it!

title: Super fun!!!
text: These balloons are great!!! They're super stretchy and incredibly easy to blow up. And they're probably the easiest balloons I've ever had tied off.  I blew up a couple a few days ago and they've held up....  my kids are having a blast! Highly recommended!!!

title: Absolutely Adorable!!!!
text:
My youngest is a huge Mickey fan and so I can't tell you how excited he was to get this playset!!!
This set came with the cutest Mickey in an a electronic car, as well as some extra adorable accessories. He's had it for a week now and has played with it every day! Loading the car into the elevator and then sending Mickey over to the car wash is his favorite part.
This set feels really well made too. It took a little bit of effort to put together, but I think that was an ok trade off since everything is made out of a thick, durable plastic. My son and I can't recommend this set enough. It opens up a whole world of imaginative play. I think it would be a great gift for any Mickey Mouse fan!!! Thank you Vtech, we really love it!!!

title: It's a fun addition!!!
text:
My kids (and my husband) are loving this track set!!! The launcher is super powerful and it is a ton of fun. I had to take away a star because most of the cars we already own aren't heavy enough to complete the full lap.... but to be honest, that was the part that gave everyone the most laughs. The cars that are too light go flying every which way! I also didn't love that it requires 4 D batteries. That seems like a lot for a toy these days.
This set came with a lot of pieces and took longer to assemble than most Hot Wheels sets we've owned. However, once assembled, it's quite sturdy! We already have hundreds of hot wheels, tracks, and sets; so this was an awesome addition! Everyone here would recommend it!!! It would make a a pretty sweet gift!

title: Huge hit!!!
text:
Our oldest is all about Treasure X this year, so this toy couldn't have been more perfect for him! It kept him busy for hours!!!
I'm not going to lie, I found the gutting of the shark a little morbid with this one.... but he's just a kid and thought it was the coolest thing ever. Once he had retrieved all the pieces, it was easy enough for him to put together on his own. The instructions were easy enough for him to read and follow on his own.
This shark toy is made of decent quality plastic and the slime isn't too sticky. I appreciate that Treasure X "exploration" toys aren't nearly as messy as many of the other "exploration/dig" we've owned that were made by other toys makers. In addition, I'd consider it a really good value, seeing as how it kept him busy for hours. It's not a "one and done" toy either.... he's still playing with the shark and his alien skeleton guy days after he was done finding the pieces. I can not imagine any kid not absolutely loving this!!! (His 6yo sister was very jealous that her brother got this, btw). I'm excited to buy my kids more Treasure X this coming Xmas. Highly recommended!!!

title: Tons of fun!!!
text:
Our oldest has always loved Treasure X toys, so I can't tell you how excited he was we pulled this pirate ship out of the Amazon box!

Now that we've gotten to open it and play with it, I can promise it is even cooler than it appears in the pictures. Our son had much fun digging for all of the pieces. The instructions were easy enough for him to read and follow on his own. I didn't find this to be any where near as messy as so many of the other hidden treasure kits we've had.

Personally, I think this toy is a really good value. The pieces are made out of high quality plastic and they feel really durable. I took him quite a while to find everything and he's probably played with it for about ten hours total now (which is ridiculous long for any toy to keep his attention... especially once the dig was over). I honestly think any kid would be thrilled to get this as a gift. It really is that awesome! I'll be getting him more Treasure X for Xmas, that's for sure! Can't recommend this enough!

title: My second HeMan Mega Construx set, will get many more!
text:
I very much like this line! Like the Rotor one I got previously, this is a great representation of the He-Man world in a buildable block format. Comes with 3 figures, Panthor, and the whole Point Dread and Talon Fighter perch!
The nostalgia alone is worth it, plus the fun of the construction. So far, I would recommend this whole line to any fan of building blocks OR He-Man

title: Quality construction, nice addition to the Minecraft collection
text: My son has a bunch of these figures in this scale for Minecraft. They are generally well made and he has a great time playing with them with his blocks. These figures in particular are cool because the golem is HUGE compared to the regular sized figures, and it feels more realistic, like in the game. He has fun fighting the big boss with his team of adventurers!

title: Awesome gift!!!
text:
Our oldest is obsessed with Fortnite and we love their toys. I can't tell you how excited he was when we pulled this vending machine out of the Amazon box!

Now that we've gotten to open it, I can promise it is even cooler than it appears in the pictures. Our son had much fun opening all of the blind bags. It was a little messy, but it is worth it. He's played with the 8-Ball and Ruin figures and all their extras for hours so far.

I think this toy is a really good value. The pieces are made out of high quality plastic and they feel really durable. Plus you get so many accessories, it's ridiculous. Any Fortnite fan would be thrilled to get this as a gift. It really is that awesome! I'll be getting him a more Fortnite toys for Xmas for sure! Can't recommend this enough!

title: Hours of fun!!!
text:
Our youngest loves Blippi's youtube show and so we were very excited to find out they are making Blippi toys now. I can't tell you how excited she was we pulled it out of the Amazon box!
Now that we've gotten to play with this truck in person, I can promise it is even cooler than it appears in the pictures. It is so much fun and she has played with it for hours so far. The dumping action is by far her most favorite part. It's made out of high quality plastic and feels really durable. Plus, I appreciate that it isn't too loud.
I think this toy is a really good value, considering how much she how many hours she has played with it so far. Any Blippi fan would be thrilled to get this as a gift. It really is that awesome and I'm already shopping for additional Blippi toys for Xmas. Can't recommend this enough!

title: This would be an awesome gift!!!
text:
My daughter absolutely loved this tea cup set! She is 6yo, so she lives for blind bag surprise toys these days! This tea cup couldn't have been more perfect for her. And since it was bigger than expected and came with so many adorable accessories, I found it to be really good value.
My daughter had a blast opening it all up and then making the pretend tea. She's unwrapped the entire toy cup over a week ago and still plays with the dolls on a daily basis. And I appreciate that the surprise big pink cup is well made too, since she likes to keep the surprise "egg shell" to play with in the future. This is a really cool surprise set and my daughter would highly recommend it.

title: What an awesome present!!!
text:
My daughter loves this Rainbocorn set! She is 6yo and has one already, so this was a very welcome surprise.
She loved taking this one apart layer by layer and adored the surprises. She's had the plushy for a week now and has taken her rainbococrn to bed with her every night. And the flip sequence belly is just too cute. She fidgets with it constantly.
The plushy was far bigger than expected in my opinion and feels really well made. And since she likes to keep the surprise shells these types of toys come in, so I appreciate that the "egg" is made out of durable plastic. My daughter and I can't recommend this surprise set enough!!! It would make an wonderful present!

title: Really nice! *UPDATED REVIEW*
text:
*UPDATED APRIL OF 2022*
Guys, these markers really last! I'm coming back to buy her a second set for her birthday only because she has lost or misplaced so many in the last year and a half (not really her fault, our new puppy loved to chew up her things). She has continued to draw nearly every day; and of the Bic markers she still has, they are all still super juicy and drawing beautifully. She still loves them so much, she absolutely refuses to let them be mixed with her crayola markers! They really are fantastic quality.

*ORIGINAL REVIEW:
My daughter really likes these markers! She's an artist and draws pictures every day. These are going to be perfect for her because I can't even tell you how many sets of crayola markets we have gone through in the last five years.
A HUGE part of the reason why we have gone through so many markers is because my daughter loves to lose both the markers themselves and their caps. I feel terrible talking bad about my daughter, but it is truly mind boggling how good she is at loosing both. I find parts of markers throughout the house constantly. In and under: the couch, her bed, through the kitchen and even in our cars. She lives for drawing and her markers. My daughter is the *perfect* test subject for these and I will be back in about 90 days with an update to see if these last.
So far I'm excited for these though. The ink is bright and the colors very pretty. And I love the solid color of the plastic tube; it makes the color easily identifiable. I also appreciate that this set comes with two of every color, because as I stated above, she loses markers constantly. The only thing I didn't love was the packaging. The cardboard was weak and came unusable from being sent in a padded envelope. Not a deal breaker for us though since all her markers go right into art storage bins. So far, I'm really excited to recommend these!!!

title: So neat!
text:
This set of stickers is an excellent value! They are bright and colorful; and easy to peal off the back sheet. My daughter was so excited to get these!
The stickers come on sheets that are slightly smaller than a standard 8 X 11" piece of paper. My only complaint is they could have easily made the packaging half the size. It's large amount of package for how many "sheets" you end up with. But with that said, there is still an amazing variety here. We can't recommend these stickers enough!

title: Easy to use, stands up to reckless driving
text:
I got this as a first RC car for my elementary kids. It was easy enough to setup and understand the controls with little training for my kids. The battery life lasted as long as their interest did, which is pretty good.
My kids were NOT careful at all with this toy, but it hardly shows it. It did a great job of crashing into things and jumping curbs and kept right on going. It doesn't look much worse for wear, and I am sure it will keep going.
Good first RC car!

title: So much fun!!!
text:
My kids were super excited by this set of bracelets. I gave each of my kids one early to test out and they loved them. They've had a blast playing with them for the past few days now. They're really nice.
I picked these up because our children's elementary school is not allowing birthday and holiday food treats this year due to covid. Unfortunately, that includes Halloween candy but I'm determined to give out something fun for Halloween anyway. And these bracelets are a great, affordable replacement to real candy treats. And you get so many in this pack... there is enough to split between my kid's two classes. I just LOVE these non-sugary treats!!! I'd highly recommend them!

title: Excellent for Halloween!
text:
My kids were super excited by these zipper bracelets. I let each of them have one early to test out and play with. And they wore them all day!
I picked these up because our children's elementary school is not allowing birthday and holiday food treats this year because of covid. That includes Halloween candy. So these bracelets are an awesome, affordable replacement! I love that they double as a fidget toy too. In a normal year, I would have LOVED to hand out these non-sugary treats just the same!!! I'd recommend them!

title: Better for slightly older children
text:
I picked up this set for my 6yo and she loved it. Even though she is fiercely independent and incredibly artistic, this was a too difficult for her to do on her own. Her hand-eye coordination isn't developed enough yet to push 75+ pins in place, so I ended up having to do most of that step for her. I also had to help her with keeping the string taunt. But with that said, I had a heck of lot fun doing it with her. She's never done string art before and I haven't in years, and we both really enjoyed doing the turtle together (we'll save the flower for later). She was so proud of it once we were finished.
So yeah, I would recommend this set. It's good quality and comes with plenty of extra supplies (like enough string). And seeing as how it took it us well over an hour to do, I think it's a good value. And that's important to me, because I can't tell you how many times I've spent $10 or $15 on an art kit just for her to finish in a matter of minutes. But as I mentioned before, this was to difficult for my first grader to do on her own. I think this is more suited to a pre-teen and it would make a fantastic gift.

title: So awesome!
text:
My kids are huge into Roblox, so they both loved this set! They have a couple of Roblox core and game sets already (none were this big thought), so this was a welcome addition. Words can not explain how excited they were when they took this out of the Amazon box!!!
As with all the Roblox toys, these are really well made. The plastic is thick, sturdy and they feel very durable. And you get so many pieces in this set! There was more enough figures and accessories for them to play together without any fighting over the same ones.
Now that we've gotten to play with them in person, I can assure you they are as neat as they look in the photos. This would be an amazing gift for any Roblox fan! My kids can't recommend this set enough!!!

title: Youtube fan favorite!!!
text:
My kids love this!!! They seriously play with it all the time. Especially my 6yo.
This video camera is really easy for them to use... they had all the features memorized in a few days. The green screen is really neat too. It was a big hit for a few days... especially the dinosaur chasing scene. But I will say the green screen features thrill wore off a little sooner than I would have expected. They haven't played with the different background scenes in over a week now and the games since the first day. But kids ebb and flow, I'm sure they'll go back to it in the future. But for now, my daughter is having plenty of fun making her own videos. She absolutely loves rewatching her videos over and over.
The battery life is pretty good on this and it charges pretty quickly. The storage however is not very big. We have plenty of extra SD cards around the house, so it wasn't a problem for us. But just know, you'll most likely want to pick an extra one up. I also think the picture quality is pretty good now. We have the blue vtech camera that we got about 6 years old, and you the updated technology is so much better now.
I guess the only things I have bad to say about this is I wish the green screen was a little bigger. It gets a little crowded when two kids are trying to fit on the screen. And I have a love/hate relationship with the uploading option. I have to manually hook it up to my computer via usb cord to upload to the internet. On one hand, this feels "old school" and is time consuming... but on the other, at least I can monitor and limit everything my kids want to upload to their (locked and private) youtube channel. If my daughter had her way, upload two dozen videos a day!
Anyway, I can't recommend this toy video camera enough. I'm certain any child that has expressed interest in creating their own youtube videos will LOVE this! It really is that awesome. Thank you VTech!!!

title: Unique & hours of fun!!!
text:
Without a doubt, one of the coolest things that has come out of 2020!!!! This playset is awesome.... Words can not explain how excited both my 9yo son AND his 40yo father were to unbox this playset.
My boys have spent the last three years obsessed with anything Pokemon. And we've accumulated so many Pokie toys, we honestly don't have room for any more. So I personally appreciate how compacted this toy is... and love even more that it also storage item and makes for a quick & easy clean up! I can toss dozens of his mini pokie figurines right into the bag, zip it up and the mess is gone! Plus it's like a back pack, so it's easy to hang on one of the various hooks around his room!
The extra bonus is this playset is portable. My son took it too his grandparents house this past weekend so his cousins (of the same age) could play with it too. My niece and nephew were so overwhelming jealous, I'm going to be buy them one for Christmas.
We honestly can't recommend this playset enough! I don't know a single pokie fan who wouldn't love it! It's well made and a ton of fun!!!!

title: It's an ok set
text:
I think this kit is just "ok". My 6yo was far more impressed than I was.
My main problem with this kit is that there is no way anyone could string these beads. All thread included is far to thick for the tiny bead holes. My daughter was excited to use a real needle for the first time though. Pictured next to the needed is a needle threader (threaders can be picked up for $1 at your local box if they still have a sewing dept).
The string she used to make her bead bracelet was silky smooth. It made the beading process easier... but the bracelet broke three minutes after she finished. I triple knotting it off too and that wasn't strong enough to keep the knot together. I'd recommend dotting the knot with a drop of glue or clear nail polish to make it hold.
In addition, I think this kit is divided in half; made for two different age groups. Younger children who would be interested in beading part probably won't be ready for friendship braclet weaving for a few more years. And just the same, I think older girls might find the beading process too juvenile. So if your looking for a friendship bracelet kit, I don't see a lot of value in this kit.
These is also a lot of excess packaging to make what you get seem bigger than it is. I feel like this is something that I would have pick up at five below, so $13 feels overpriced to me.
(My daughter wanted to use her own round letter beads; but she could have used the square letter beads that came in this kit just the same)

title: Exactly what it looks like
text:
This is a sturdy, good looking storage container for cars/Lego/action figures.
I originally was using this for Lego Dimensions packs (which it works great for), but then I decided I liked the individual compartments more for action figure accessories/weapons.
This is large and there is no wasted space so you can get the max usage out of it.
However, none of the compartments are adjustable, so what you see is what you get.

title: I HAVE THE POWER!!!
text:
YES! I have been a fan of He-Man for 30+ years, and also building sets, so this hits me right in the nostalgia.
Easy and fun to assemble, and very good likeness of the original toys from the 80s. The molds are detailed and have a lot of play-ability. Here is to hoping they make a lot more sets for this line!

title: Great for a Bakugan loving kid!
text:
As the title says, it is ready to unbox and brawl!
You get SIX exclusive Bakugan, which is super fun. They made for a great addition to our collection.
They have good abilities, and look great!
Great value, 6 new Bakugan cant be beat!

title: Disappointed in this "kit"
text:
I can't in good conscience recommend this product. It's nothing more than a box of plastic beakers. The kit doesn't come with a single ingredient needed to make any of the projects happen. If I ran to my local box store right now to pick up all that is needed, I could easily drop another $30 plus dollars for everything. Granted I bet you could pick up half the items at the dollar store and save a few bucks, but then your making a second stop. In addition, it's 2020. Who realistically has those batteries on hand anymore... So that's another $5.
Unfortunately, my kids haven't gotten to try this kit yet. I made the mistake (after quickly reading the back of the box), and agreed to let my kids do one of the projects after dinner last night. I saw the checklist and figured surly we had enough of the ingredients on hand to do at least one project in this kit. Nope. Not a single one. Even the basic slime recipe was altered to calls for a b vitamins!
So I definitely would not consider this item giftable. Especially this year. It requires far to many extras and make assumptions the recipient will have access to all of those ingredients. At the same time. It looks like we'll be dealing with Covid through the Xmas season and I'm not interested in making extra unnecessary trips to the store. Not to mention, we live up north. Our local stores having been out of stock on so many items and USPS is taking two plus weeks to deliver items. This kit couldn't have been released at a worst time, in my opinion.
Normally we love Learning Resources. They're a great company. I don't know what happened here.

title: A fun, boy themed surprise egg
text:
My son is going to love this!!! His younger sisters are always being gifted with girly surprise eggs and he's always jealous. It feels like there is only one boy surprise toy on the market for every dozen girl ones.
And this egg is great! You get a lot of surprises in this things for only $10. I'd recommend it!

title: Fisher Price and Disney are the perfect pair!
text:
What an adorable playset! We love all things Disney in this household and this is no exception. They redesigned to the Little People line since and the figures are just to cute too.
Fisher Price makes really nice stuff and the quality is evident in this toy. The redesign of this line was done well. It is still made out of the traditional, thick, high quality materials Fisher Price had always used.
It's nice that this playset is ready to go right out of the box too. It makes for the perfect gift. I don't know a single real life princess who wouldn't love to own it. It quickly became a favorite and my youngest plays with it a lot! We highly recommend this adorable playset!!!

title: So awesome!
text:
I had one of these when I was a kid in the 80's and I have always wondered if they would "come back". We're all excited that it did.

This is the ultimate fidget toy! The modern version is definitely improved. The magnets help keep the shape you just made and the seams feel much stronger. I really like the funky psychedelic pattern too.
My husbay and my kids "fight" over this toy now. One of them always has it in their hands. It really is fun. We all highly recommend it!!!

title: So much less anxiety now.
text:
This is an awesome puzzle board! I love puzzles, but it's a risky adventure in my house. I have three cats and three young kids... and not a one of them respects my puzzle zone, lol. So this board is amazing for me! Knowing my project was "safer" really cut down my stress a lot.
The lightly textured velvet does a fantastic job gripping the pieces! It's very smooth. Yet it isn't too grippy; it's still easy enough to slide around and pick up individual pieces. The board is large and very sturdy. There is a little weight to it, but it's not to heavy. I really like it and would recommend it!

title: Super cool!
text:
This guy is awesome! My 8yo son is a huge Marvel fan and Spider man is in his top three favorite characters.
He also has severe ADHD. Just out of habit, he has had some sort of fidget toy in his hands constantly. It's been a habit for the last five years at school and it's to the point where he's even comforted by "fidgeting" while at home. We have two "junk drawers" full of fidgets, it's that serious. His favorite types of fidgets are the jelly stretchy toys, so this toy couldn't be more perfect for him!!! He hasn't put this Spiderman toy down in days. He carries it with him everywhere.... like a toddler carriers their favorite blanket.
And did I mention this toy is huge!!! Even though the manufacture did a great job with the description, I was really blown away when I took it out of the box. And the quality feels solid. I expect this to last for years. And I appreciate that because it is so big, it isn't a toy that will be easily misplaced, lol. We can't recommend it enough!!!

title: The most played with set
text:
Our 6yo loves the Cave Club youtube show! So she was very excited to find out they made these dolls in real life. It feels like she's been asking me to get these for her for forever (aka: at least month now, lol). So no words can describe how excited she was she opened the amazon box and saw Furrah & Fernessa!
Now that we've gotten to play with a couple of the Cave Club dolls in person, I can assure you they are as neat as they are on the show. Their hair and cloths are super fun and funky. And my daughter loves that each doll comes with a ton of accessories. Being a natural caregiver, my daughter also loved that this one includes the baby! It's probably her most played with of all the Cave Club dolls so far.
So beyond the fact that my 6yo is in love, I also think these dolls are a really good value. Especially considering it comes with two dolls and extra accessories. And coming from Mattel, I appreciate knowing that I can trust this brand and the quality. I honestly can't imagine any Cave Club fan not being thrilled to get this set. They are seriously adorable and so much fun. We can't recommend them enough!

title: She loves her long, long hair!!!
text:
Since our 6yo loves the Cave Club youtube show, she was very excited to find out they made these dolls in real life. She's been asking me to get them all for her. Emberly is one of her favorite characters, so she was really excited about getting this one in particular.
Now that we've gotten to play with a couple of the dolls in person, I can assure you they are as neat as they are on the show. Their hair and cloths are super fun and funky. My daughter loves Emberly's long hair and her matching extensions. She's probably combed through her hair six dozen times in the past few days and washed it at least twice. Just know that while a lot of the Cave Club doll come with tons of accessories, this particular edition of Emberly does not. But my daughter would tell you her long hair more than makes up for it.
I think these dolls are a really good value, considering they come with a pet and how cute they are. And coming from Mattel, you already know you can trust the brand and the quality. I can't imagine any Cave Club fan not being thrilled to get any one of these dolls as a gift. They are seriously adorable. My daughter and I can't recommend them enough!

title: So many accessories!!!
text:
Our 6yo loves the Cave Club youtube show! Once she found out they made these in dolls in real life, she started asking for them all. I can't tell you how excited she was she opened the amazon box and saw Emberly!
Now that we've gotten to play with a couple of the dolls in person, I can assure you they are as neat as they are on the show. Their hair and cloths are super funky and fun. My daughter loves that each doll comes with a ton of accessories. Emberly in particular seems to have more accessories than most. And her dino pet is just too adorable.
No matter which one you choose, I think these dolls are a really good value. Especially considering all the accessories that are included.
