Girls need to know that STEM is for specifically girls too. Stop whining over a stupid color, you're the problem!! -a female engineer

title: Enjoying the new faces
text: Some have complained that by trying to show diversity the game is now ruined because there are less subtle differences compared to the original characters. I honestly can't say that's true. First of all, there are so many features to pay attention to and somehow the game is ruined because they added more variety to the skin one? The range in skin color in combination with other GENERIC features is such that it can be kind of ambiguous. Like there are a lot of characters where I'm wondering if I'm looking at a really tanned white person with blue eyes or a person of color. It wouldn't necessarily be that helpful to bother asking in order to knock down only a few with confidence. Others have complained that it opens the opportunity to eliminate characters based on skin color like that would somehow foster discriminatory children. Really? Would it really be so bad to recognize different skin colors? Last I checked blind people can't play this game and we all know if you were questioned for a description of a person by police that if you really saw the person you'd be able to do so without any issues. If someone looks a certain way, it is what it is.

title: Very pleased
text: Please note for the pictures I purposely selected dark cards to showcase the sleeves. Brighter cards are going to be much easier to see. This is my first time buying sleeves for my board game cards. Not sure what to expect but I really like them. They feel like quality sleeves that won't break easily. They are a bit slippery, not sure how normal that is. The slipperiness makes shuffling the cards along the sides really easy which also keeps me from having to bend the cards. A traditional shuffle is quite harder. These sleeves add considerable bulk to a deck, which is as expected with any sleeves. Don't expect to be able to keep any insert trays that come with a game. Keeping large stacks from toppling is an issue but we just break the stack into smaller stacks. A few times a little clumsy finger tap from trying to grab the top card has sent 2-3 cards flying off the top. I probably would not use these for a true card game. After having tried Gamegenic's sleeves made specific for a certain game and seeing how snug and perfect those are, I can attest to there being a little extra unnecessary room, if using standard card sizes, especially at the top, but it's not as bad as the extra space I've seen for fantasy flight sleeves. The extra space at the top of fantasy flight (from reviews) turned me off personally but I think these are tolerable. The only thing is that if all the cards are stacked facing the same way, the unused space causes a deck to stack with a tilt. With the matte sleeves, I haven't experienced any eye strain or heard any complaints. The matte does knock down the visibility a little but I don't think it takes away from the experience much and I think it's as expected for any matte sleeve. Lastly, I think the sleeving process was pretty easy, but again, I have little experience. The game-tailored sleeves were a bit tougher to put on in comparison but they were also bigger cards so they'd already be inherently harder to sleeve.

title: One for party gamers
text:
I was bored? As someone who prefers mentally stimulating games that don't leave much to chance, this is not a game I'd reach for to play over and over. I thought maybe, because it's called The mind... but no. But hey, bravo for making silently staring into each other's eyes for several minutes less awkward!

I do think this would be a fun party game to play once or twice but still, for me it'd quickly lose its novelty. I also want to point out that it does leave open opportunity for someone to be left feeling stupid or shamed by playmates because they quickly played poorly thought out card(s) that cost the game. I prefer when cooperative failures can't be pointed to any one individual

title: 3 Hr Learning Curve
text:
I love this game but it's not a game to casually grab and play with just anyone. Took me about 3+ hrs to learn how to play and a few 1-2 hr play throughs before I got the hang of it and there's probably still something I'm overlooking. The game is fun and easy once you understand how to play but it's very complicated and could easily overwhelm new players. There's just a lot to keep track of. There are a lot of moments where we pause and question if there's anything we missed which makes the game feel like it's going slower.

Also, while I think they nailed some parts of the rulebook, like visually showing game setup and having an index, I think in a lot of ways the rulebook could've been done better. I frequently have to flip through several different pages to better understand one thing and I'll feel like I still didn't get an answer.

The game is supposedly designed to prevent alpha players but there's really no built-in defense against delta players. My current designated playmate, despite having played several games, has me hold their hand through almost every single step for their own play and requests my guidance to the point that I can't focus on my own play until they're done with theirs. When I prompt for coordination for just a small portion of my play, whether due to being a poor team player or not having the confidence with the rules, it's not reciprocated and then I'm somehow a nuisance to them for taking forever because I'm finally able to set up my own play. Granted, I might not have the most ideal playmate right now but hosting a game night, especially with multiple new players, currently seems like a nightmare. So with that... it's great for solo play!! Again, love the game

title: Arrived Damaged, No Shrink Wrap
text: Arrived damaged, box was completely ripped along corner, wasn't shrink wrapped. Kind of ridiculous... Was considering overlooking the shrink wrap thing but as a serious board game player, I don't want to start out with an already busted box.

title: What soft click??
text: I was really hoping to experience the mystical soft click but I never heard in once between 1000 pieces. I'd have given 5 stars if they hadn't lied about it only to bring my hopes and dreams crashing down.

title: Not made for the bigger noodles only the smaller pool noodles
text: The size noodles available these days does not fit this sling. The noodle I bought was super tiny and wouldn't hold up a child is was so flimsy. The bigger noodle used to float on is to big for this sling. Should have returned it.

title: PERFECT gift for kids
text: PERFECT gift for kids. I purchased this for a 3 year old girl and her 6 year old brother plays with it too! I love Melissa and Doug products.

title: Awesome, now it's my number one traveling game.
text: Awesome! Thank You for the great craftsmanship, portable for traveling. Packaged very well with a carrying protective pouch. Every piece made is in every detail including the magnet pieces by Chess Bazzar.

title: Arrived broken
text: Waste of money, spinning mechanism was broken

title: It's fun for a girl and a boy. Suck it, Slinky!
text: Great stocking stuffer. A big hit!

title: Yay, Plah-Doh! But the mats are paper
text: It's play-doh! What's not to love? The stamps are great, but I would have preferred larger tubs of play-doh in the set. Not really a big deal. I deducted 1 star because the mats are paper, which is not very durable at all!! I took mine to the local copy store and paid about $10 to have them laminated. Problem solved!

title: There's a monster in my kid's room!!
text: My 2 &1/2-year-old, whom I have always called my Little Monster, recently discovered monsters. Monsters Inc, Monster Bowling... If it has monsters, he likes it. I stumbled upon this little cutie when I was looking for monster themed books, and I knew my own Monster would love him!! I also ordered a completely unrelated (but monster themed) book that arrived in the same box. My guy is a book fiend, so he instantly reached for the book when I unpacked the box, but quickly put it down to snuggle the monsteroo as soon as he saw him! So very cute-- the product images don't do him any justice-- and very soft and cuddly!! Just what you'd expect from Gund!

title: Sweet, cuddly soft fox
text: This little fox is so cute and cuddly! We got it for my 4-month-old son, (washed and dried it immediately before giving it to him-- it stayed super soft and didn't shed) and he adores it! He smiles so big and snuggles her close when we give his Foxie fox to him, and he often falls asleep cuddling her at night before I put him in the crib (he's still too young for me to feel comfortable letting him have anything in the crib with him, unsupervised). Well made and appropriate for boys and girls. I would have loved a toy like this when I was little... part of me is a little jealous that my son gets to have her and I didn't!  ;)  I'm considering picking up a second one as a spare....

title: Love this bug!
text: This bug is awesome! My 3 month old received it as a gift when he was born, and we had no idea we would use it every day! The wave sound soothes him and we use it to put him to sleep every night. He needed surgery when he was 2 months old, and we brought it to the hospital with us for use afterward. It seemed to comfort him then, too! We always take it with us on car rides and it's our go-to when we need to calm our little boy. The music is nice, too, and I usually play it for my son during his morning feed. Loud, quiet, and off settings are great. I do wish there was an option to leave it on for more than 15 minutes, but that's the only thing I'd change!

title: FAVORITE PUZZLE ALL THE TIME
text: My 2 years old loves this puzzle so much he plays with it everyday. He enjoys looking at the pictures. I like the quality of the puzzle and no toddler frustration. Everything went well. Definitely would buy more and more to go until he gets older. I asp love the texture of the puzzle so satisfying.

title: Five Stars
text: Daughter loved it! Packaged well and just as soft and fluffy as it looked online

title: Perfect gift
text: Item as described. Soft to touch and easy to flip. Super cute.

title: AVOID THIS BATTERY
text:
Bought this for an RC plane. Plugged it into a high quality charger. Burned and started a fire first time. Visited the nearest RC Store for a replacement and the staff and customers all told me this was a disaster waiting to happen.

This could have resulted in a catastrophic situation.

Do not buy this battery. Ever.

title: Dol Guldur comes to life - Lego style
text: This is must have set for any Tolkien fans.  We love it - as usual Lego presents a product that exceeds expectations!  My almost 11 year old loved building it!

title: Classic game - quick to learn and play
text: My husband played this growing up, so of course he has our boys enjoying the game now.  They began playing when they were 9 and 11.  It is easy to learn, and can be a quick game - sometimes 15-20 minutes and there is a victory!  It is their first choice in board games

title: Nice Addition
text: I really like this collection for Civil War, the quality of the pops is really nice and I really like the paint jobs on these pops. I do wish they fit together like some of the other collections but I still really like this pop.

title: Great for Holidays
text: I love pops, and we love guardians. Over the years we have been acquiring a lot of Pops that's are holiday oriented to decorate the house for holidays. These are a great addition for that purpose. They are all super cute, I like the variety of the figures and how they are decorated for the holidays. The quality is really good and I like them a lot.

title: Love It
text: I have to say I was really excited about this lol because it looks so dynamic with him stepping through the circle. When it arrived it did not disappoint. It's definitely one of the cooler looking pops we own. The paint job is great, but it's the detail on the circle that really makes this pop stand out. I really love it.

title: Nice Addition
text: This is the second pop I've gotten from this series and I think it's pretty well made. The paint job isn't as extensive as some others but it fits along with the costume of the character and even being monochromatic there are still a lot of details shown on it.

title: Excited About New Funko Series
text:
This is another one of those funko series of pops and I am super excited about this one just because of how many figures are going to be included. It does not seem to me that these are going to be connected though like some of the others, so I am wondering how it is meant to be configured when more of the figures come out.
I like the paint jobs on this figure, its well done, and I like the base on this figure as well. Overall, I think this is a good start.

title: Really Nice Looking Funko Pop
text: This is a really nice quality Funko, the paint job is great and the detailing on it is also great. I really like this funko and it looks great on display.

title: Love It
text: I saw this on TikTok and I bought it. I have no regrets. I love the idea of a body pillow but i have yet to find one that I really truly like. This one is the best. I love the softness of the fur, which makes it feel more like a stuffed animal than a pillow, which is both fun and comfortable. Both of my dogs really love the llama and it's great for cuddling. I have even used the head as a makeshift pillow and it works fantastic, and I tend to be a person who is super picky about what pillows I use, and I love this one. I would highly recommend.

title: Really Nice
text: I have funkos have been upping their game lately. The last three Funkos I have bought I have been so happy with and this one is no exception. The paint job is so great on this one, the contrast in colors makes it so vibrant, and the sharpness in general made my husband do a double take to see if there was some metal in this pop. It looks great, and it perfect for display, I'm very happy with this purchase and highly recommend.

title: Super Fun, Great for 2 Players
text: My husband and I love playing board games, but honestly, it's not always easy to find fun games that we can play together as only two player games. This game is fun to play with only two players, it is easily learned, it's fun to play with a group of people as well. I like that you can make up your own categories and the categories on the card are wide ranging. It's also a game that is really quick to play so you aren't locked into a multi-hour long game, great for a quick fun time.

title: Great Detail
text: This is probably one of our new favorite funkos, the detail on it is really fantastic as is the paint job. It's a great addition to our collection.

title: Great Detail
text: My husband loved this show, so I knew I was going to get him the funkos from it, and this was the first. We were both really impressed with how much detail the pop had and how nice it looks. The head is huge, which is great because it also makes the bobble more dramatic. I would definitely recommend this one for anyone who liked Moon Knight.

title: Great Addition
text: My husband is a huge Captain America fan, so this is a fantastic addition to our funko Captain America collection. The actual figure is super well done, really did a fantastic job making it look like the movie, and the paint job is fantastic. I'm super happy with the purchase, it's very giftable.

title: Good Quality
text: This is probably one of our favorite funkos. I like the paint job on it and it's really done well.

title: Super Cute
text: The bobble is really done on this one. I like the detailing, it's very nice, especially with the chair, the paint work is really well done. It fits in well with the rest of the set and is very giftable.

title: Great Gift
text: My husband loves D&D and he always has an issue with storing all of his items and books that go along with it, especially when he is trying to take them to someone house. I was actually really impressed at the quality of the bag, and my husband loved it. It fits all of his books with ease, he can store his miniatures (and has room to grow) as well as has a lot of other pockets. I'm very happy with the purchase and would recommend it to others.

title: Super Cute
text: My husband loves these, it's one of his favorite scenes in the movies, so this was super giftable for him. The quality is really good, the paint job is nice, and i love how they are interconnected. Overall, it was a great gift.

title: Great Gift
text: Nice quality, the paint job is good and I like the general dynamics of the figure. It's great for gifts, and makes a great addition to our collection.

title: Love it
text: This was really easy to put together, but still took a good amount of time. The pieces in this one are on the smaller side of things, compared to some other kits. I really like the look of it once its finished, I'm really happy with the lego sets that are coming out for Marvel.

title: Super Cute
text: Really well made, nice paint job, and great for our Marvel collection of Funkos

title: Love It
text: My husband and I collect Funko's and I love this one. The wings look great, and aren't flimsy at all. The paint job is really good, and the overall mold looks fantastic. It's probably one of our favorites that we have gotten this year.

title: Great Present for Gamers
text: My husband has been asking for a gaming mat for quite some time now, so I bought him one for Christmas and he loves it. The art on the top is something that he totally loved, and it also works great for when his group comes over to play.

title: Super Cute
text: These are super cute, easy to peel and remove, and stick great. They are also super legible. Great for any Marvel fan.

title: Love the Design
text: I love the design of this pop, it looks super cool in person. I really think the paint job really makes it pop, and it's really well constructed. It goes great with my Captain American collection of pops.

title: Best Advent Calendar
text: I love this Advent calendar so much. Harry Potter is my favorite and Christmas is easily my favorite time of year, so needless to say this is right on brand for me. I loved the variety of characters in this pack, and that they included some of the animals as well as people. I also like that the figures are really well made and will hold up well, I packed them up with our Christmas stuff and I plan to display them next year with our other Christmas stuff.

title: Bigger Stickers are Great
text: So the bigger stickers in this set are really great, very easy to see. All the stickers in general are easy to peel, have good sticking power, and can be removed pretty easy as well. My main issue is the smaller stickers, of which there are a lot, as so busy and mostly really dark in color, that it makes it very difficult to tell what exactly is on the sticker without getting really close to it. Other than that, they are good.

title: Super Cute HP
text: We used these stickers during Christmas for our 25 Days of Christmas Gifts. The thing I liked about them is that they are incredibly readable even though their size is small, it makes it easy to tell what you are looking at even at a distance. They peel off really easy, and stick onto wrapping paper as well as regular paper great. They are also easy to remove without leaving behind sticky stuff as well. Great for the price.

title: Great Final Piece
text: We have been collecting these since they came out, and honestly I love how the final product looks and how they all snap together to form the whole Avengers team. The quality on these figures is really nice, and the colors really pop. We really love this purchase.

title: I wish there was a bigger on the cover
text: We got this for a family activity to do during Christmas, and I love all jigsaw puzzles so on that regard I don't have any complaints. My one issue with this particular puzzle is the packaging, there is only a very small picture of what the puzzle is suppose to be, very difficult to see while working on the puzzle, I think it would have made sense to put the picture on the top of the box, but oh well.

title: Awesome Rocket
text: I love this Rocket, he was a great gift for my husband. My husband loves both Rocket and Venom, so the combination of the two was basically the perfect gift for him. The detailing is really nice as is the paint job, the quality is on par with all his other Funkos. I am very happy with this purchase.

title: Awesome Thor
text: I love this series of funkos, my husband is collecting them for his office. I really like this Thor, the quality is good, the paint job is good and overall it's a great edition. I like how each of these nest into each other and when the series is done they will create one big piece. I like the detail that is included in the platforms as well.

title: Nostalgia game not worth it
text: So much like the episode this game is based on, it makes no sense at all. The trivia is okay, its the best part of the game, but the scoring and movement on the board itself is bizarre and makes no sense, so basically the winner is completely arbitrary. If you are just looking for laughs and someone who loves Friends this game will probably work for you. But if you are someone who loves board game or is competitive in any way this is probably not the game for you.

title: Great addition to my Endgame collection
text: I really like this War Machine, the detail is really nice and the paint job is pretty good too. He makes a great addition to my end game collection.

title: Super cute, lots of small pieces.
text: This is a super cute little set, it's both adorable and fun to build. The pieces on this set are a lot smaller than some of the other sets I have bought. I found this to be an advantage because it took longer to assemble, but you might want to be aware for younger kids. Overall, I really liked it.

title: Time Suit Nebula
text: Love this version of Nebula, I have a bunch of her but I like her in the time suit. The detail is really well done as well.

title: Great second pop to the series
text: I love this second pop in the series. I didn't realize they would all interlock together, so that makes me even more excited to finish the collection. The bobble head is cute, the paint job and detail is really nice; and I really enjoy it.

title: I love her!
text: I love RBG, and when I saw she had a Funko I was like sign me up. She's super cute and adorable, and she is on my shelf right next to Bernie, and I love it.

title: Super awesome
text: Probably one of my favorite Funko pops of Captain America. The molding was great, and the added lightening effect looks really cool. Big fan.

title: Love it
text: Probably one of my favorite Spider-Man Funkos, it's so great seeing this figure. It's actually really stable, and the molding must have been really great because the detail is really good. The paint job is all really good too.

title: Awesome game
text: I love this game, way more than I should seeing as I'm an adult. My husband and I play this game at least once a week. From this box I mostly play as Scar, that's easily my favorite deck to play. My husband alternates between the other two. Personally I think Scar is best matched against Hades from the other box set, since they are more evenly matched, but you can do it however you like. I also really like that you can mix and match boxes with characters.

title: Very nice
text: Super cute; very giftable, nice paint job, and stable enough to stand on his own

title: Great detail
text: I bought this as a gift for my husband and he loved it. The detail on this is really amazing, probably my favorite iron man that they have made. I also really like the base, it makes the whole figure seem more dynamic.

title: Fat Thor is awesome
text: This far Thor is awesome. He's so cute, I love how well they did the stomach and the pizza. The bobble head is nice too.

title: Great set, rides that work (and light up)
text:
[[VIDEOID:dcafed0c1764b40e8a192a2cd8171670]] I loved putting this LEGO set together, it was hours of fun. I think the best think about this set is that there are two full rides to build and each of them work, as in you can put the characters into the seats and then have them use the rides. There are also a couple of smaller buildings that you can build when you have less time.
This set is clearly more geared towards girls, which I liked, and the figures are different than the standard LEGO figures you might be used to.
I would recommend this set for older kids 7-10 because there are an extreme amount of very small pieces, if your child is younger than this I would recommend a lot of supervision.
I highly recommend this set and I hope to do more of them in the future.

title: Fun quality Batmobile
text:
This was a fun quick build. I was impressed with the quality of the tires, I could actually see this build being used to actually play with versus just build.
There are a lot of little small pieces in this build that weren't actually necessary for the build, which I find a little annoying. Also because of how many little pieces there are I would recommend for younger kids to be supervised.

title: Fun to put together love the different choices
text:
[[VIDEOID:b06e08b1588ffa4e4e8cd13c606362fd]] So the cool thing about this set is that you get to choose which carnival attraction you want to build, the pieces included will put together 1 of 3 options. The only real downside to this cool feature is that the bags can't exactly be labels as bag 1, bag 2, etc because the pieces will be put together differently based on what you choose. So there is a lot of hunting around for the right pieces while putting this set together.

I could easily see this being enjoyable for a child, but be aware there are a lot of really small pieces in this set, it will be easy to drop things so it might not be the best for younger kids. I put this together for neuro-rehab after brain injury, it was fun to do while still be challenging for my brain. I would easily recommend this kit.

title: Very durable
text: So this is not the best review if you are looking for this as a stuffed animal for kids, because I got this specifically for my dog. My dog likes to have large stuffed animals to lay on top of or cuddle with and his current one was kind of falling apart, so I figured it was time for a replacement. Enter Cassie the cow, or at least that's what we named her. She is huge, which is great, and super well made. Even with a 90 pound dog laying down on her every day she really hasn't flatten out at all. Our dog occasionally carries her in his mouth and she has no damage from it at all. I'm very very pleased with the construction of this stuffed animal and would highly recommend. Also it's really soft and comfy, I've even used it as a pillow and it worked.

title: Ron at the Yule ball
text: He's so cute! I love this funko of Ron, I have both the Hermione and Dumbledore Yule Ball pops so this one fits right in.

title: So cute, great gift
text: I love Funkos and I have a large collection myself, I bought this for a friend who is a huge fan of the Silver Surfer comics, and I thought this was a really good funky version of the comic book character. He loves it, great buy.

title: A Unique Addition to Funkos
text: This is such an interesting Funko, it doesn't look like most Funkos, with the coloring and the sparkle, it sets it apart, which I liked a lot about it.

title: Great Guardians Addition
text: Love it, so cute, great addition to our Funko Marvel collection

title: The perfect Funko
text: I love this guy. He is so cute and adorable! He's also super well made, the paint job is really good and the mold is really detailed as well. This is probably one of my all time favorite Funkos.

title: Great for Star Trek fans
text: I love Star Trek, I'm slightly obsessed (okay more than slightly) anyway I have been looking for a fun Star Trek themed game to be able to play on game nights, and when I saw this one I knew I had to have it. Some of the questions are easier, some of them are definitely hard to get right, even for someone who watches the tv series on netflix all the time. I liked that there is a mix of all the different series, and I liked that the game can be made shorter if you don't have a lot of time. This was a great game for us at our house and we love playing it.

title: Great for anyone who loves Vikings
text: Like with Floki, this POP is really detailed. I was impressed by how well done all the details were done on this figure. The coloring is great, the quality is really good, and he is a really great addition to our collection.

title: Super detailed and adorable!
text: This guy is so cute! He is my husband favorite of the Vikings POPs, and I like him a lot because he is really detailed, much more detailed then some of the other POPs we own.

title: Super cute
text: This little guy is so adorable. I love him. I bought him for my husband, he's a huge fan of anything Captain America, so I thought this would be great for his desk, and he was.

title: Worf is ADORABLE
text: I love this little dude! Worf is one of my favorite characters in the Star Trek universe, and I really wanted to have him on my desk in my office. I have to say I think he is one of the cuter Funko Pops, and his ridges are great too. He seems to be of pretty good quality, and good paint job, so I'm pretty happy with the purchase.

title: Don't waste your money, impossible to peel off the roll.
text: I bought these to put on the back of my envelopes for our Christmas cards this year (and maybe to use for wrapping some things), but they did not work out in any way, shape, or form. Yes they were a good price, but they were basically unusable. Getting the sticker off the roll was next to impossible and once you had the sticker off the roll it was bent and smushed and did not look nice at all, I couldn't use it for purpose or function at all. I even tried using my vinyl peeling tool for when I use my Silhouette, but even that didn't work. Also it has made in China written on EACH and EVERY sticker, quite largely, which was also a huge turnoff for me when it came to putting any of these on a present. I do not recommend buying this in any way.

title: Great set of gift tags!
text: I really loved how diverse the gift tags were in this set, there are some really cute ones in here that worked really great for kid gifts and some more elegant looking ones who worked great for adults. I was also really impressed with the amount of gift tags that were included in this set, this is going to last me for several Christmases, easy. Highly recommend.

title: Not the best board game
text: My husband and I like playing board games, so we bought this game in hopes that it would be a nice addition to our collection. As it turns out the instructions are very confusing, it takes forever to set up, and we didn't even bother trying to actually play it. If you aren't willing to figure out how to play a very complicated game that I wouldn't recommend buying this game.

title: Tough to build, but worth it
text: Prepare to spend hours and hours building this kitchen. The instructions are wordless and made up of endless complex pictures of pieces of wood, plastic, and a million variations of screws and nails. Once you get through the building process, the kitchen itself is beautiful. It has lovely detailing and the neutral tone makes it not a total eye sore in your home. My toddler loves making us meals and washing the dishes in the sink. Something to note - kitchen does not come with any food/pots and pans/accessories.

title: Realistic High Qualify Toy Food
text: Melissa & Doug makes the most amazing high quality children's products and this toy food set is no different. The food is a good variety, looks realistic, and is made of high quality and durable plastic. My son loves playing with these items in his toy kitchen. The food is the perfect size for tiny hands.

text: We purchased these for my almost son to go along with his KidKraft toy kitchen, but returned due to poor quality. The food was made of thin plastic and would not have stood a chance against my teething tot. It was a shame because the selection of food was great.

title: My Go-To Gift
text: This Melissa & Doug sushi set is my go to for birthday gifts. It is something you don't see all over the toy shelves and the personalization option is such a thoughtful touch. The set is well made with quality materials that are safe for any age appropriate kiddo.

title: Far too big for Tonner dolls.
text: Far too big for Tonner dolls. The seat itself seems more an American girl size.

title: Cute kit. Not for children, but most adults could do it even if they are fairly new at miniatures.
text: The directions are fairly straightforward. Its not particularly easy to put together and takes a lot of patience. This is definitely not for children. I'm mostly using it as a base for customizing it myself, but I think it would also be very cute to do as is. Keep in mind that this is half scale, so it is smaller than the standard size of most dolllhouses. Most contemporary dollhouses are 1:12 scale so the items in this kit are not interchangable with those houses.

title: Flimsy
text: I guess I should have known for the price but these are pretty flimsy. I feel like my dolls are constantly threatening to topple over.

title: I love her
text: I bought her, not as a collectible, but to repaint. Her bone structure is perfect for older doll faceups.

title: Work well but for a short time
text: I love these for the music festival. They make cool light shows when you wave your arms around, but they are especially useful for when you need just enough light in the porta potty at night to see where you are going, but not so much that you actually see whats in there. They do lose there light fairly quickly though and the little rubber band comes off fairly easily. For the price though, they are worth it.

title: Disappointed in the quality
text: Not the same quality as it was. Cheaply built in my opinion.

title: Meh
text: My son was stoked about this for about 15 minutes. Putting it together was a bit difficult since the instruction were not truly clear. Mostly the stickers. Just over all not a great buy. My son is 9 of that helps.

title: Fun in a bundle
text: This was a Christmas gift for a 12 year old. Surprisingly she actually really liked it and it fits in her desk at home easily on the shelf. It truly is an easy all in one art set up.

title: Perfectly cute!
text: I do not usually write reviews on toys because honestly they break and kids quit playing with them etc. with that said I am actually writing a review because my kid has had this fir a couple months now. This is bigger than the usually Polly pocket case which immediately made my kid super happy! Like over the top happy. It was the hit of her birthday to be honest and this was one of the basic gifts she received yet one the day! It is super cute and after 2 months of being played with every day still hasn't broken. The latch is still holding with no problems. What is even better is a unicorn AND a poly pocket so best of 2 worlds die a kid that asked for poly pockets and unicorn.

title: Super cute, but falls apart!
text: [[VIDEOID:c2aad783594074354a10b7893f52ebc9]] Super soft, super loveable. But, the ear came off!

title: Fashion Forward Females Rejoice!
text: I gave this as a gift to my 11 year old cousin.  In minutes, she had it up and running on her phone and was busy doodling her new fashion design.  A great gift for a creative, fashion forward girl!

title: Cool gift
text: As advertised

title: As advertised
text: As advertised

title: Nice present
text:
Nice present for a little girl.
Good quality

title: As advertised
text: As advertised

title: Well worth the price for a solid product!
text: This birthday gift to my girlfriend made her whole birthday! It's durable, HUGE and well worth the price. She's literally using it right now next to me as I'm typing this review!

title: Looks Amazing
text: This was a birthday gift to a friend in another country:) they absolutely loved it! They said the packaging was supreme. Nothing was out of place, crushed, or missing. So I am very satisfied with this purchase. It also got there within a week and a half of me ordering it. Which is way faster than predicted, and the company called and confirmed that he had received the package. I couldn't be happier.

title: Dogs love, but not for ones who destroy
text: All of my dogs tend to destroy toys. They've gotten the arm of this one easily. However they haven't totally destroyed it because they love it. I would recommend it for smaller dogs probably not the big destroyers

title: Yahtzee but needs the original shaker
text: Love this easy fun game but the shaker is narrow and doesn't allow the dice to mix up. Bring back the original square shaker

title: 1/3 of cards are misprinted
text: Questions from cards show answers from other cards.  Toss out over 1/3 of cards

title: It's not too bad - actually the best I could find online or in stores
text: For the price, it's a good deal.  Oddly, I REALLY wanted a water bottle slot on the outside which is why I went with this one over another one.  And not just for a water bottle, but to through my keys in or whatever other SMALL item I wanted to be handy - so I was disappointed that the entire bottle slot is not mesh, the bottom is just a strap so you can ONLY use it for a water bottle.  However, I still like the bag overall.

title: Beautiful
text: My daughter loved it and it turned out beautifully

title: Great for price
text: Great party favors

title: Not happy
text: [[VIDEOID:2458300765552370b7b4e1e85d7e0979]] I did not get the letter T for Birthday so I can't use it

title: Didn't work
text: These only shot out of the blaster when it was pointed at the ground. Won't be buying again.

title: My son loves it!
text: My 13 year old son got this for Christmas and he was able to put it together by himself and he loves it. He had fun experimenting with the amount of weight to put into the bucket to make it work correctly. Every time he uses it he says how much he loves it.

title: Sturdy but small
text: Perfect for my niece! She is just barely learning how to save and she loves when we get to add another dollar to it. The only reason it is 4 stars is because it is smaller in person than I expected. Otherwise good and sturdy!!

title: OK
text: It's OK but I've seen kits that did more when they were complete. Other then the steering turning and the cylinders moving it's pretty static.

title: Nice change from other kits
text: You can build 3 things but the instructions are only for one. You have to go online to get instructions for the other 2. The beasts are pretty cool but they fall apart easy when you put them in motion. They will make the builder think because opposed to building something like a truck or plane, the opposing sides of the beasts can be different (you right thumb points left but left thumb points right kind of thing). Once it's built though they are still pretty cool.

title: Really exciting for my 4 year old
text: My daughter loved doing this craft. She needed an adult to glue, but it was exciting for her to place the items where she'd like and she views the finished project as absolutely magical. While it's not something that will keep a child occupied for hours while they work on it, she loved seeing the components come together.

title: Great quality
text: These look fantastic when completed. I love that they have rubber caps for the ends.

title: Uno with a twist
text: Bought this for my son and he loved it. I like it as well because the card rules have added extras to do such as dancing,etc. It's a lot of fun for the whole family.

title: BTS BTS BTS
text: I ordered the BTS Dolls. I received  J-Hope,V,JK,and Jimin  all in one order. They look amazing and got here relatively quickly. They're a birthday present for my son since the concert was postponed and I know he's going to love them.

title: Great Purchase
text: I wanted to get something for my son's birthday since the BTS Concert was postponed. So I ordered Suga and RM and they came quickly and looked really nice. The pricing was reasonable.

title: Kid at Heart
text: I love this. I ordered this for myself,so cute and ugly at the same time.

title: Just what my granddaughter wanted!!
text: Granddaughter wanted it her birthday.  She spent hours playing with it.

title: Lots of fun
text: My grand kids love this ball

title: Satisfied
text: Love this, my grandson loves this George

title: Recommend

text: My grandson loves this, I'm glad I  got it for him, thank you

title: perfect!
text: Thunder Thunder Thunder cats HOOO!

title: A great set especially for the price
text: Well made and nice looking.

title: Kinda hard to put back together but that's why I like it
text: I really like the different colors of stained wood and it's very pretty just sitting on the shelf. Pretty good quality for the price, I'm happy with my purchase.

title: Only green lights, not multi colors
text: The customer review photos show the frisbee with multicolored lights. I thought that's what I was getting because the official pictures didn't show it lit up so the customer pictures with the multi-colored lights are why I chose to purchase this. The frisbee I received is only green lights and it's super lame in comparison...

title: Absolutely beautiful! Even my teenage daughter
text:
Absolutely beautiful! Even my teenage daughter, whom is not a belly dancer, just had to try it on! LOL!
My dance instructor complimented me on it! I just plain love it!

title: Beautiful
text: So beautiful and fun to put together! I am gluing it to display during the next Christmas holiday!

title: Fun game! We often just use the card to ...
text: Fun game!  We often just use the card to ask each other questions without using the board.  Cards would be great to use in the car.

title: This was a gift to grandchildren
text: What can we send to distract those phone addicts - if only long enough to take a break that permits conversation?  These filled the bill!  They loved them - compared designs - friends got them too, so there was competition!  Good choice!

title: Cute set and great fun
text: Great fun for the kiddos.  They love scooping up the balls and matching the colors  Great for teaching colors and for dexterity.  Gotta love the Montessori sets.

title: Still learning...
text: I love the simplicity of these cards and the beautiful artwork.  Its uplifting to use the cards as they are intended and I appreciate the reminders that the cards bring.  Its a really nice set.

title: Really useful
text: We have 10+ long rows of lavender plants on a water drip system and it's been time-consuming to frequently walk the lines in cases of leaks or breaks.  The drone finds them for us!  On our farm, we can see lots of ways to use this - it is easy to handle and sends us the info we need!  Great idea for a farm and for when grandchildren visit!

title: Cute set
text: This is such a cute set of wooden cars.  The quality is great and my grandson loves them.

title: Love it.
text: Nice learning set for preschool and kindergarten kids.  Great way to learn the alphabet and count.  For older kids it can help with early math problems.  Its well made and comes with flash cards and a magnetic board.  This is fun and educational all at the same time.

title: A novelty item
text: A great surprise for kids - all kids like swings and all kids like skateboards and surfing.  This is a nice Surf swing board that the grandkids get a lot of use on when playing outside.  Its sturdy enough and was fairly easy to hang from one of our big tree limbs.

title: Definitely a toy
text: This drone is definitely a toy and that's why I got it - the grandkids thought it was really cool, but its not something that holds their attention.  It would be a great beginner drone for someone who wants to practice before buying something more expensive and less like a toy.

title: So much fun
text: These little cars are a big hit with the grandsons, 5 and 2.  There are 3 animal cars with little cars inside the bigger cars.  You can push on the tail to release the little car and catapult it forward.  Such a cute idea.  They work really well and they keep the kids attention.  Great for developing dexterity.  Fun toy!

title: Big hit with the kiddos!
text: New favorite toys for my grandsons!  Great for toddlers and bigger kids too.  They stretch and bend into different shapes, hats, bracelets.  Come in a color variety, make funny noises and keep the kids amused for hours.  Love these!

title: For the granddaughter...
text: The grandchildren are twins, so when we give a gift it's always times 2! The grandson got the dolphin.  These wooden puzzles are really a good gift - or one that stays at Grandma's - they're sturdy wooden pieces that don't get lost like the cardboard ones - and when finished, my granddaughter felt like she had really accomplished something!  Very pleased - she loved the fox!

title: For the grandson
text: Our grandson loves puzzles, and, it seems that pieces always get lost in these huge puzzles that take so long to put together.  This puzzle is perfect - very sturdy wooden pieces - and just challenging enough to keep him busy on a rainy afternoon!  When he comes to visit, we love to have something unique for him, and this puzzle filled the bill!

title: Cute Puzzle
text: This was a fun little project for my grandson who loves minions!  He needed a little help but the puzzle is very easy to put together and he loves the finished product.  The kit comes with glue and there are instructions on the back of the box.  The puzzle is a little smaller than expected but is very cute and well made.

title: Great gift
text: A really great-looking chess set - the pieces are all so interesting!  This looks great on the coffee table - all set up and ready to play!  It comes in a beautiful chest, which opens to be the board.  Great gift for a grandchild to inspire learning the game - one game you can play all your life!  A special  set - bound to be a family treasure. Obvious good quality.

title: Cute game for kids!
text: This was a Christmas gift for my grandson, Charlie and he loves the fact that he and the squirrel have the same name.  He is a little young for the rules, but loves to feed the acorns to Charlie and watch his eyes get bigger and bigger until he pops and all the acorns come back.  He laughs and laughs.  Love this game for my Charlie!

title: Paw Patrol lovers will love!
text: Great gift for the grandkids who love Paw Patrol.  Nice quality in this set.  Set of 3 resin figures with plenty of paint and stickers.  Craft kits are always  hit with the grandkids and this one did not disappoint.

title: Beginner's blocks
text: Beginner's blocks should be soft and chewable - and they are so much better than wooden ones!  These fit together easily, so they're a learning experience as well.  Almost everything goes in the mouth, so these are something soft to teeth on.  And it's fun for Mom to see what baby can do, too.  This would make a great gift when the baby is reaching for things.  These blocks are something easy for the young baby to hold!  Good choice!

title: Stylish design for this classic table game!!
text: Solid wood construction and lovely earthen tones on this classic game board. A perfect addition to any coffee table!!
